Unless otherwise stated, NHIC is the owners of the copyright and database rights in this website, including content data, design, graphics, text, images, software and underlying source codes.

Use License

Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) of NHIC’s website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title and under this license you may not: 

Modify or copy the materials;

This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by NHIC at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.

The availability of the information and guidance as part of the website does not constitute a recommendation by NHIC, of any medical practice, particular medicine, or to buy any plans etc., discussed therein by NHIC, any of their personnel or any advisor. 

 

You shall be solely responsible for any decisions, which you arrive at after your own evaluation of the products of NHIC and your need for the same post consultation with any of your advisors. While reasonable care would be taken to ensure completeness, accuracy, etc., of the information/services provided, neither NHIC nor any of their personnel shall in any circumstance be liable for any loss or damage caused by your reliance on information obtained through the website. 

 

It is your sole responsibility to evaluate the completeness, accuracy or usefulness of any opinion, guidance or other content made available on the website and you should consult your own legal counsel, business advisor, medical advisor and tax advisor as to the legal, business, medical, tax and related matters concerning any policies with respect to which guidance is sought or given at the website.

Confidentiality

NHIC does not collect any Personal Information through the website. In the event of collection or processing of personal data in the future, NHIC shall take all reasonable steps to preserve the confidentiality and prevent any corruption or loss, damage or destruction of the data and information provided by you. All personal information including any claim related or medical information will be kept confidential. It shall only be disclosed at the time of processing your claims. NHIC shall also take reasonable steps to ensure the security of and to prevent unauthorized access to the services on the website. 

Privacy

Use of this website is subject to the Privacy Notice. You agree that you have read the Privacy Notice and your continued use of the website serves as an acknowledgement for having read and understood the details provided therein.
  
NHIC or its Partners may provide value added services which connect Users directly to the medical service providers via video call, voice call, text message, online chat or other electronic means and the information exchanged between the User and the medical service provider is stored and used in accordance with the Privacy Policy. However, it is at the discretion of the User, to avail such Service if it is available.

Appointments and Interaction with Medical Service Providers

i. While NHIC will try to ensure a confirmed appointment with a medical service provider (like doctor or diagnostic lab) for a User who request for an appointment on the Website or App. Neither NHIC nor its Partners guarantees that the ser shall get a confirmed appointment. Further, NHIC and its Partners have no liability if such an appointment is confirmed but later cancelled, postponed or rescheduled by the hospital or medical service provider, or the medical service provider are not available as per the given appointment time. 

 

ii. You understand and agree that any interactions and associated issues with other Users including but not limited to your health issues and your experiences is strictly between you and the other Users. You shall not hold NHIC or its Partners responsible for any such interactions and associated issues and NHIC will not be held responsible or liable for the same. For avoidance of doubt, the Services are not to provide any healthcare or medical advice or diagnosis and hence NHIC and its Partners are not responsible for any medical or other outcomes between you and the medical service providers you interact with, pursuant to any interactions on the Website or App. If you decide to engage with a medical service provider to provide medical services to you, you do so at your own risk. 

 

 iii. NHIC or its Partners advises the Users to perform your own investigation or get feedback prior to selecting a doctor or any other service provider available on the Website or App. iiiii

 

iv. Without prejudice to the generality of the above, NHIC shall not be liable for: 

 

any wrong medication or treatment quality being given by the doctor(s), diagnostic service provider(s), or any medical negligence on part of the any of the above; 
any type of inconvenience suffered by the User due to a failure on the part of the medical service provider including doctor to make himself/herself available at the appointed time, no show by the doctor, inappropriate treatment, or similar difficulties; 
cancellation or rescheduling of booked appointment or any variance in the fees charged; 
any medical eventualities that might occur subsequent to using the services of a doctor, diagnostic lab services, pharmacy, whom the User has selected on the basis of the information available on the Website or App or with whom the User has booked an appointment or performed a transaction through the Website or App. 

 

Further, NHIC shall not be liable, under any event, for any comments or feedback given by any of the Users in relation to the services provided by another User. All such feedback should be made in accordance with applicable law. 

Limitations

In no event shall NHIC or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on NHIC’s website, even if NHIC or a NHIC’s authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. While accessing the services of NHIC, you may be re-directed to a third-party website or platform and NHIC shall not be responsible for any damages arising out of the use of such third party’s website or platform. As some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

 

NHIC shall not, under any circumstances, be liable for any special, consequential, indirect, incidental or punitive damages of any kind or character, including but not limited to loss of profits or revenues, loss of product and loss of use arising out of or related to any failure of performance, error, omission, interruption, defect, delay in operation or transmission, computer virus or line or system failure.

Revisions and Errata

The materials appearing on NHIC's website could include technical, typographical or photographic errors. NHIC does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete or current. NHIC may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice. NHIC does not however, make any commitment to update the materials.

Website Terms of Use Modifications

NHIC may revise these terms of use for its website at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these Terms and Conditions of Use.

Governing Law

Any claim relating to NHIC's website shall be governed by the laws of the State of Karnataka without regard to its conflict of law provisions as may be applicable.

Permission to contact

By clicking the Submit button (when prompted), I hereby authorize NHIC or any of its authorized service providers to call or communicate to me with respect to healthcare services requested by me at the given telephone number/ WhatsApp number/ email id duly registered in my name. By clicking on the Submit Button, I consent to overriding the National Do Not Call/ Do Not Disturb Registry.

Frequently Asked Questions
I already have a corporate cover with my employer. Why should I buy Arya Health Plan?

While your corporate health cover offers some protection, it's important to remember that it's tied to your employment and may not fully meet your healthcare needs. Here’s why:

 

You will lose your coverage should you change jobs.
The sum insured may not be enough to cover major expenses.
Restrictions on room type and rent could limit your comfort.
Essential consumables like bandages and syringes (which make up 10-15% of your bill) often may not be covered.
Routine care may have little to no coverage.
There's typically no proactive support to keep you healthy in the long run.

 

That's why having an Arya Health Plan 1 is so important. Taking this step now gives you peace of mind, knowing you're taken care when you are healthy and protected no matter what life brings.

I want to understand how does top-up work?

Consider that you have a corporate cover of Rs 2 lac with your employer and you wish to top-up this 2 Lac coverage to 50 Lac of coverage with Arya Health Plan 1

 

This is how it will work:

1. You will only pay for coverage of only INR 48 Lacs for Arya Health Plan and receive great savings on premium!
2. In case of hospitalization claim, your corporate cover will take care of the initial INR 2 Lacs of bill, post which Arya Health Plan coverage will trigger, and pay eligible expenses up to the remaining INR 48 Lacs.

 

In summary, you will be buying Arya Health Plan with a deductible of Rs 2 lacs.


Following deductible options are available:
- INR 25,000
- INR 50,000
- INR 1,00,000
- INR 2,00,000
- INR 5,00,000

I already have an existing retail health insurance. Why should I buy Arya Health plan?

It's great that you already have a retail health insurance plan for yourself and your family—this is an important step in protecting your health. But is it sufficient? We believe it’s not as they are not comprehensive enough, have limits on coverage, have confusing T&Cs​ leading to poor experience at time of claim.

 

Arya Health Plan 1 goes beyond typical coverage and are designed not only to cover you when you're sick but also to help keep you healthy. We’re committed to your well-being, so if you fall sick and need surgery despite our efforts, we’ll refund your entire yearly premium on top of covering all your hospital bills guaranteeing Zero out-of-pocket expenses. This way, you can focus solely on recovery, while we take care of everything else.

Why is a health check-up required before buying Arya Health Plan 1

We are your partners in helping you get well and stay healthy. To do so, we both need to understand your current health. Our Care Management team will support you step by step to help you adhere to your doctor-directed health management plan. Together, your doctor, our team, and you will work to keep you out of the hospital. 

 

Once you have completed your initial health check-up and we have accepted you for coverage, your policy can never be cancelled (as long as you pay the due premium on time), regardless of future changes to your health. This way, you can have peace of mind knowing there won’t be any unexpected claim rejections.

Will the price increase because of the health checkup?

There are no additional payments required by you to get the health check-up done.

 

However, depending on the results of the health check-up, your premium may increase if health markers suggests that your current health condition in outside normal parameters.

 

In certain cases, we may defer the issuance of subscription for Arya Health Plan 1 and Plan 2 and coverage.

Which family members can be added to the plan?

Self, Spouse, Children (>3 months to 25 years), Parents and Parents-in-law

What does the OneHealth Promise benefit in Arya Health Plan 1 ?

It's our job to keep you healthy - and out of the hospital. That's why we will return your premium if you get hospitalized for a surgery due to a health issue as an Arya Health Plan member.

Which hospitals and clinics is covered under Arya Health Plan?

For hospitalization, your coverage extends to all 21 Narayana Health hospitals across India.

 

For routine care (OPD), you're covered at all Narayana One Health Clinics and Narayana Health hospitals.

Do I need to pay myself for consumables like bandages, syringes, etc.for hospitalization?

No, you don't need to pay.

 

Consumables and non-medical expenses during hospitalization are covered with Arya Health Plan 1, guaranteeing Zero out-of-pocket expenses from your end.

 

Consumables and non-medical expenses typically make up 10-15% of your hospital bill. Most insurance products do not provide cover for this.

What room-type and room-rent for hospitalization will I be covered for?

At Narayana Health, there are no limits on room type or room rent.

 

We understand that your comfort is a top priority during challenging times, and we ensure you have the flexibility to choose the room that suits you best.

Can I port my policy to Arya Health Plan?

Yes, you can port your existing policy to Arya Health Plan.

Can I use an Arya health plan outside of Narayana Health network?

Yes, your Arya health plan provides coverage outside the Narayana Health network in specific situations.​

While we recommend using the Narayana Health network for seamless coverage, we understand that there are times when this may not be possible. In such cases, we’ve got you covered:​

 

1.  Medical Emergencies: If you are travelling and the Narayana Health network is unavailable at your location.​

2. Travel Situations: If you’re travelling and there’s no Narayana Health facility nearby.​

3. Unavailability of Treatment: If the required treatment isn’t offered within the Narayana Health network at that time.​

4. Relocation: If you’ve moved to a new location where Narayana Health facilities are unavailable.​

 

For any claims or queries, feel free to reach out to our support team.

What sum insured does Arya health plan have?

We have multiple sum insured options ranging from ₹25 Lacs up to ₹1Crore.​

What happens in case of emergency or travel if treatment is taken at other out-of-network hospitals?

Our primary purpose is to provide you with healthcare whenever you need it. While we require you to seek treatment within the Narayana Health network for coverage, we also provide coverage outside the network in the following scenarios:​

 

In case of an emergency, when you seek care at the nearest hospital, please refer to the points below for the definition of an emergency:​

1.  If you are travelling and the Narayana Health network is unavailable at your location.​
2. If the required treatment is not available within the Narayana Health network.​
3. If you have relocated to a new location where Narayana Health is unavailable.

How do I claim with Arya health plan?

For planned admissions, please call us so we can prepare everything for you in advance. At the Hospital, you will be supported by our care team at every step of the way. Alternately, please present the Digital Health Card we issue at the Insurance Desk, and we'll handle the rest. We want you to feel comfortable and focus solely on your recovery, while we take care of everything else.

HEALTH.

EXCUSES.

PHYSIOTHERAPY AND PHYSICAL REHABILITATION
Overview

Physiotherapy at Narayana One Health provides comprehensive rehabilitative and therapeutic services to improve physical function, relieve pain, and promote recovery for individuals across all ages. Our experienced physiotherapists specialise in assessment, diagnosis, and creating tailored treatment plans for managing both acute and chronic physical conditions. With services ranging from post-surgical rehabilitation to sports injury recovery and neurological care, we are dedicated to helping patients regain mobility, strength, and independence. Combining expert manual therapy with advanced modalities, we deliver personalised care to support your journey to recovery and wellness.

Book Appointment
Our skilled physiotherapists excel in:
Assessment and Diagnosis

Conducting comprehensive physical and functional evaluations to identify specific issues and develop effective treatment plans.

Manual Therapy

Using hands-on techniques to improve joint mobility, reduce pain, and address musculoskeletal dysfunctions.

Therapeutic Exercises

Prescribing targeted exercises to enhance strength, flexibility, and functional movement tailored to individual needs.

Electrotherapy

Using advanced modalities like TENS (Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation) and ultrasound therapy to alleviate pain and promote healing.

Pain Management

Employing specialised techniques and educating patients on strategies for managing chronic pain effectively.

Rehabilitation Programs

Providing structured rehabilitation for post-surgical recovery, sports injuries, and neurological conditions to restore optimal function.

Geriatric and Pediatric Care

Addressing age-specific concerns with fall prevention for older adults and developmental support for children.

Treatments we offer
Back and Neck Pain
Arthritis
Post-Surgical Recovery
Sports Injuries
Stroke and Neurological Conditions
Frozen Shoulder
Balance and Gait Issues
Sciatica
Joint and Soft Tissue Injuries
Pediatric Developmental Delays
Back and Neck Pain
About Back and Neck Pain

Relief for pain caused by muscle strain, herniated discs, or poor posture.

Treatment Process
01
Initial Assessment

A detailed evaluation of your physical condition, medical history, and symptoms to develop an effective treatment strategy.

02
Customised Treatment Plan

A personalised plan combining manual therapy, exercises, and advanced modalities tailored to your needs.

03
Therapeutic Intervention

Using a mix of techniques like manual therapy, strengthening exercises, and electrotherapy to enhance recovery.

04
Rehabilitation and Progress Tracking

Guiding patients through recovery exercises while monitoring progress for post-surgical or injury rehabilitation.

05
Home Exercise Program and Lifestyle Guidance

Providing exercises and lifestyle recommendations for long-term health maintenance and recurrence prevention.

When to Consult a Physiotherapist

Consider consulting a physiotherapist if you experience:

 

Persistent pain in muscles, joints, or bones affecting daily life.
Difficulty with mobility, strength, or flexibility post-injury or surgery.
Balance issues or frequent falls.
Chronic conditions such as arthritis impacting joint function.
Neurological symptoms like weakness or mobility challenges post-stroke.
Sports-related injuries affecting performance.
Delayed developmental milestones in children, such as difficulty walking or crawling.
Pain from repetitive strain or poor posture in areas such as the neck, shoulders, or lower back.
Your Recovery, Our Commitment

At Narayana One Health, we are committed to supporting your journey to recovery through compassionate, expert care, ensuring the best outcomes for your physical health and well-being.

Cardiology (...
CARDIOLOGY (ADULT)
Overview

Cardiology is a specialised branch of medicine that focuses on the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of heart and circulatory system disorders. At Narayana One Health, our cardiology team is dedicated to offering comprehensive care for adults experiencing cardiovascular issues or those at risk. With a focus on advanced diagnostic tools and personalised treatment plans, we aim to support your heart health through preventive care, chronic condition management, and emergency interventions.

Book Appointment
Cardiologists at Narayana One Health excel in:
Coronary Artery Disease (CAD) Management:

Expert diagnosis and treatment of narrowed or blocked arteries to restore and maintain proper blood flow to the heart.

Hypertension Management:

Comprehensive care for high blood pressure, including medication, lifestyle counselling, and monitoring.

Arrhythmia Diagnosis and Treatment:

Specialised management of irregular heart rhythms using medications, procedures, and devices such as pacemakers.

Heart Failure Treatment:

Tailored care plans for managing heart failure symptoms and improving quality of life.

Advanced Diagnostic Testing:

State-of-the-art tools like ECG, echocardiography, stress testing, and Holter monitoring for precise evaluations.

Preventive Cardiology Services:

Risk assessments, lifestyle modification counselling, and management of contributing factors like cholesterol and obesity.

Treatments we offer
Routine Cardiac Care
Management of Acute Conditions
Management of Chronic Conditions
Cardiac Procedures
Heart Wellness Programmes
Routine Cardiac Care
Preventive Cardiology

Risk assessments and lifestyle guidance to help prevent cardiovascular diseases.

Screenings

Regular monitoring for early detection of conditions such as high blood pressure, arrhythmias, and elevated cholesterol.

Cardiology Treatment Process
01
Initial Consultation

A thorough discussion of symptoms, medical history, and lifestyle factors.

02
Physical Examination

Blood pressure measurements, heart rhythm checks, and a general evaluation.

03
Diagnostic Testing

Advanced tools like ECG, echocardiograms, and stress tests to pinpoint heart issues.

04
Diagnosis

Clear communication of findings and implications for your heart health.

05
Personalised Treatment Plan

Strategies ranging from lifestyle modifications to medications and interventions.

06
Follow-Up Care

Regular reviews to monitor progress and optimise treatment outcomes.

When to Consult a Cardiologist

You should seek cardiology care at Narayana One Health if you experience:

 

Chest Pain or Discomfort: Persistent or recurring pain that may signal heart disease.
Shortness of Breath: Difficulty breathing during activity or rest.
Heart Palpitations: Irregular or rapid heartbeats.
Swelling in Legs or Fatigue: Symptoms that may indicate heart failure.
Dizziness or Fainting: Potential signs of arrhythmias or other heart conditions.
Family History of Heart Disease: A proactive approach to assessing and managing risk factors.
Heart Health, Our Priority

At Narayana One Health, our cardiology team is committed to helping you achieve and maintain a healthy heart. With a focus on patient-centred care, we aim to improve your overall quality of life through expert diagnosis, innovative treatments, and ongoing support.

About Nhance

Imagine a world where skin and hair are more than just physical attributes. They're reflections of your inner beauty, your confidence, and your overall well-being. At Nhance, we believe that everyone deserves to feel empowered by their appearance.

We're not just a clinic; we're a movement. Rooted in the trusted legacy of Narayana Health, our mission is to redefine the way people approach skin and hair care. We've created a space where dermatology, aesthetics, and cosmetology converge, offering a holistic approach to your beauty journey.

Why Choose Nhance?

When you choose Nhance, you're not just selecting a clinic; you're embarking on a journey to rediscover your radiance. Our

 commitment to personalized care, advanced technology, and a holistic approach sets us apart. Experience the Nhance difference

 today and unlock your full potential.

Personalized Care

Our experts create personalized treatment plans for your unique skin and hair concerns

Cutting-Edge Technology

Our clinic uses the latest FDA-approved technology for the safest and most effective treatments

Holistic Approach

We believe true beauty comes from within, focusing on the root causes of your skin and hair concerns

A Legacy of Trust

Backed by Narayana Health, we bring trust, excellence, and patient-centered care to every interaction.

Book Appointment

Dermatology Procedures

Don't Just dream of great
hair
and skin
make it a reality today!
Book An Appointment
Our Locations
Nhance Skin and Hair Clinic, Electronic City

Narayana Clinic, Second floor, next to Thalassery Restaurant, opposite Style Union, Neeladri Nagar, Electronics City Phase 1, Doddathoguru, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560100

Nhance Skin and Hair Clinic, HSR Layout

4th Floor, No. 459, Sector 4, HSR Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560102

Frequently asked questions
How do I know which treatment is right for me?
We understand that every person’s skin and hair needs are unique. That’s why we offer personalized consultations. Our experts will assess your concerns, discuss your goals, and recommend a treatment plan tailored just for you.
What services do you offer at your skin and hair clinic?
At our clinic, we provide a range of dermatology, aesthetic, and cosmetology services. From acne treatments, anti-aging solutions, and laser therapies to hair restoration, chemical peels, and advanced skincare, our focus is on helping you look and feel your best.
Are your treatments safe?
Absolutely. All our treatments are performed by doctors themselves or closely supervised by them, using the latest technologies (FDA approved) and highest-quality products. Your safety and comfort are our top priorities, and we follow strict protocols to ensure everything is done in a safe and hygienic environment.
How long will it take to see results?
Results vary depending on the treatment and your individual skin or hair condition. Some treatments, like facials or peels, can give you an instant glow, while others, such as hair restoration or laser treatments, might take a few sessions to show noticeable improvement. During your consultation, we’ll give you a clear idea of what to expect.
Does laser hair reduction hurt?
Most people experience minimal discomfort during laser hair reduction. It’s often compared to a slight snapping feeling on the skin, but our advanced lasers are designed to be as comfortable as possible. We also offer cooling mechanisms and numbing creams to help reduce any sensation.
How do I prepare for my appointment?
We’ll guide you through specific pre-treatment instructions depending on the service you're coming in for. For example, if you’re getting laser hair reduction, we might ask you to avoid sun exposure and shave the area being treated. Don’t worry—we’ll give you all the details before your visit!
How many sessions do I need?
This really depends on the treatment. Some treatments, like chemical peels, may only require one session, while others, like laser hair removal or hair restoration, may need multiple sessions to achieve optimal results. We’ll walk you through the process during your consultation and create a customized plan based on your needs.
Will there be downtime after the treatment?
Many of our treatments have little to no downtime, meaning you can get back to your day right away. However, some treatments like chemical peels or laser therapy might leave mild redness or sensitivity for a short time. We’ll make sure you know what to expect before and after your treatment.
Can I book an appointment for multiple treatments on the same day?
Yes! We offer flexible appointment scheduling so you can combine treatments if needed. If you’re interested in a combination of services, just let us know, and we’ll help you plan the perfect self-care day.
How do I take care of my skin/hair after treatment?
Post-treatment care is super important! We’ll give you all the instructions you need to protect and nourish your skin or hair after your session. This could include using specific products, avoiding sun exposure, or following a gentle skincare routine. Don’t worry, we’ll keep it simple and easy to follow.
Do you offer packages or membership plans?
Yes, we offer a variety of packages and membership plans that provide great value if you’re looking for ongoing treatments. Whether it’s skincare maintenance or a series of hair restoration sessions, our team can help you choose a plan that fits your goals and budget.
What should I do if I have a skin or hair emergency?
If you have a sudden skin or hair issue, such as an allergic reaction, a severe breakout, or unexpected hair loss, give us a call immediately. Our team is here to help you find a solution as quickly as possible, and we’ll guide you through any steps you should take before your visit.
Can I consult with a dermatologist online?
Yes! We offer virtual consultations for those who prefer to discuss their skin or hair concerns from the comfort of their home. You’ll receive the same personalized advice and treatment recommendations, all without having to visit the clinic.
How do I book an appointment?
Booking an appointment is easy! You can either call us directly on 7026222222, use our online booking system from the NH Care App, or send us a message through WhatsApp. Arya Healths can also book your appointments via your care coordinators. If you’re unsure about which treatment to book, don’t hesitate to reach out—we’re here to help you every step of the way.
What if I need to cancel or reschedule my appointment?
If you need to cancel or reschedule, just let us konw and we’ll be happy to find another time that works for you.

Become an Arya Member

Nhance
Dull Skin - ...
The Ultimate Skin Care Routine for a Naturally Radiant, Glowing Complexion

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut et massa mi. Aliquam in hendrerit urna. Pellentesque sit amet sapien fringilla, mattis ligula consectetur, ultrices mauris.

Let Us Dive Into A Step-By-Step Daily skin care Plan
Eczema (Atopic Dermatitis)

Eczema, a chronic skin condition, can be frustrating and uncomfortable. Our experienced dermatologists will carefully assess your skin and develop a treatment plan tailored to your specific needs. This may involve either moisturizers, topical steroids, or immunosuppressants.

Rosacea
Rosacea, a common skin condition, can cause redness, flushing, and visible blood vessels on the face. At Nhance, we understand the discomfort and self-consciousness that Rosacea can bring.
It can be treated with topical medications, antibiotics, and laser treatments to reduce redness and visible blood vessels.
Dermatitis (Contact and Seborrheic)
Dermatitis, a common skin condition, can manifest in various forms, such as contact dermatitis and seborrheic dermatitis. These conditions often lead to skin irritation, redness, and discomfort.
Our approach at Nhance is to provide gentle, effective care. The treatment plan may involve managing through topical treatments and avoidance of irritants.
Microdermabrasion

Imagine a world where your skin can breathe freely, revealing a youthful, radiant glow. Microdermabrasion (MDA) is a non-invasive procedure that gently exfoliates the outermost layer of your skin, removing dead skin cells and revealing a smoother, more vibrant complexion.

Alopecia (Hair Loss)
At Nhance, we understand the emotional impact of hair loss and are committed to providing effective solutions.
It can be treated with topical treatments, oral medications, or hair transplant surgery.
Fungal Nail Infections
Fungal nail infections can be unsightly and stubborn. At Nhance, we offer effective treatments to help you reclaim healthy, beautiful nails.
It can be treated with oral or topical antifungals.
Ingrown Toenails
Tired of the discomfort and pain of ingrown toenails?
An ingrown toenail occurs when the edge of a toenail grows into the skin on the side of the toe, causing inflammation, pain, and sometimes infection. Our experts are here to provide effective and painless solutions. It can be managed through minor surgical procedures or antibiotics.
Paediatric Skin Conditions
We understand that children's skin is uniquely delicate and requires specialized care. Our pediatric dermatology services are designed to address a wide range of skin conditions, from common irritations to complex disorders.
We offer specialized approaches for infantile hemangiomas, eczema, and other pediatric skin conditions.
Sun Protection Strategies
Excessive sun exposure can lead to premature aging, sunspots, and even skin cancer. We believe in protecting your skin, not just treating it.
Our experts provide you with personalized sun protection advice, like using sunscreen, wearing protective clothing, and limiting sun exposure.
Psoriasis

At Nhance, we understand the physical and emotional toll that psoriasis can take. The treatment plan involves topical treatments, light therapy, or systemic medications to reduce inflammation and control flare-ups.

Melanoma

Melanoma, a serious form of skin cancer, can often be detected early through regular skin checks. By prioritizing early detection and personalized care, we aim to minimize the impact of skin cancer. Melanoma can be screened through biopsies and treated with surgical excision or immunotherapy.

Basal Cell Carcinoma & Squamous Cell Carcinoma

Our experienced dermatologists conduct thorough skin examinations to identify any suspicious moles or lesions. If a diagnosis of basal cell carcinoma or squamous cell carcinoma is made, we offer a range of treatment options, including surgical excision or Mohs surgery.

Dull Skin - ...
The Ultimate Skin Care Routine for a Naturally Radiant, Glowing Complexion

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut et massa mi. Aliquam in hendrerit urna. Pellentesque sit amet sapien fringilla, mattis ligula consectetur, ultrices mauris.

Let Us Dive Into A Step-By-Step Daily skin care Plan
Thread Lift
Concern - Anti Ageing : Imagine a world where aging gracefully doesn't mean compromising your natural beauty. Our Thread Lift procedure is a testament to this philosophy. Thread Lift utilizes temporary, dissolvable sutures to subtly lift and tighten sagging skin. Instead of invasive surgical procedures, this innovative technique suspends the skin, creating a more youthful and refreshed appearance.
Skin Boosters
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Stretch Marks : Tired of dull, dehydrated skin? Ready to unlock your skin's natural radiance? Nhance Skin Boosters are the secret to a youthful, glowing complexion. It is a minimally invasive treatment that involves injecting hyaluronic acid into the skin. It is a naturally occurring substance that hydrates and plumps the skin, reducing fine lines and wrinkles.
Skin Elixir
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Stretch Marks : Imagine a world where your skin glows with vitality, where every wrinkle fades away. Our Skin Elixir treatment is meant to do just that. Skin Elixir is a specialized treatment involving the application or injection of a nutrient-rich solution designed to rejuvenate and revitalize the skin.
QSL (Q-Switch Laser) - Pack of Six
Concern - Hyperpigmentation : Harnessing the power of Q-switch laser technology, it is a series of six treatments delivering targeted pulses of light to the skin. This innovative approach effectively addresses pigmentation issues, stimulates collagen production, and promotes overall skin rejuvenation.
Mesoestetic Pigment Pack
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars, Hyperpigmentation : Our Mesoestetic Pigment Pack is designed to restore your skin's natural radiance and even out discoloration. A comprehensive treatment pack designed to target and reduce skin pigmentation issues. It includes a series of professional-grade products and treatments from Mesoestetic, a leading brand in medical cosmetics.
Fillers
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin : Fillers are a series of dermal fillers used for different areas of the face to add volume, smooth wrinkles, and enhance facial contours. Our fillers treatments are designed to restore a youthful glow, without compromising your individuality.
Radiance Peel
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars, Hyperpigmentation : Introducing the Radiance Peel, a transformative treatment designed to reveal your skin's natural glow. It is a chemical peel that typically contains a blend of acids that exfoliate the skin, remove dead skin cells, and promote cell turnover.
Brightening Peel
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars, Hyperpigmentation : This specialized chemical peel utilizes a carefully formulated blend of brightening agents, such as glycolic acid or lactic acid, to gently exfoliate the skin's surface. By removing the outer layer of dead cells, the peel promotes cell turnover and reveals a brighter, more even-toned complexion.
Glow packs
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars : Our Glow Pack is more than just a facial treatment; it's a transformative experience designed to reveal your skin's natural glow. Crafted with a blend of exfoliating agents, brightening ingredients, and hydrating components, this treatment rejuvenates your skin, leaving it feeling refreshed, revitalized, and glowing.
Voluma I
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin : Are you looking to restore youthful volume to your cheeks and midface? Voluma 1 is your solution. Voluma is known for its ability to provide a lifting effect and improve facial contours.
Cosmelan Pack
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars, Hyperpigmentation : Tired of the shadows cast by dark spots and pigmentation? Our Cosmelan treatment works by inhibiting melanin production, the pigment responsible for skin color. It is designed to illuminate your true beauty, revealing a flawless complexion you'll love.
Wellness Drips
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin : Imagine nourishing your body with a potent blend of vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants. Our wellness drips are a revolutionary way to revitalize your skin and hair. These intravenous infusions deliver essential nutrients directly into your bloodstream, bypassing the digestive system for maximum absorption. 
Glutathione I
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars : Imagine a world where your skin glows with natural radiance. Glutathione I is a powerful antioxidant that helps to neutralize harmful free radicals, reduce oxidative stress, and promote cellular health. This potent ingredient can brighten your skin tone, reduce hyperpigmentation, and improve overall skin texture.
Medi Facial
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars : A Medi-Facial at Nhance is an experience, designed to address your unique skin concerns and reveal your natural radiance. It is a medical-grade facial combining advanced techniques and professional-grade products to provide deep cleansing, exfoliation, and nourishment.
Hydra Medi Facial
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars : A Hydra Medi Facial is a skincare treatment that combines cleansing, exfoliation, extraction, hydration, and antioxidant protection in one session. This multi-step process effectively removes impurities, unclogs pores, and infuses your skin with essential nutrients.
Carbon Medi-Facial
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars : Imagine a facial treatment that goes beyond surface-level cleansing, targeting the deepest layers of your skin to reveal a radiant, youthful glow. Our Carbon Medi-Facial is designed to do just that. The activated carbon penetrates the pores, which is then targeted by the laser to remove impurities and dead skin cells.
GFC/PRP Scalp
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Hair Loss : Imagine a world where thinning hair and hair loss are a thing of the past. At Nhance, we're committed to helping you achieve a fuller, healthier head of hair. Our GFC Scalp Therapy is derived from the patient’s own blood and is rich in growth factors that stimulate hair follicles.
Face GFC / PRP
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull skin : Imagine a future where your skin looks youthful, radiant, and revitalized. Our Face GFC treatment harnesses the power of Growth Factor Concentrate (GFC) injections to rejuvenate your skin. GFC is a potent blend of growth factors that stimulate collagen production and tissue regeneration.
GFC/PRP
Concern - Anti Ageing, Stretch Marks, Dull Skin, Hair Loss : Imagine tapping into your body's innate ability to heal and rejuvenate. Platelet-Rich Plasma (PRP) therapy involves extracting a small amount of the patient’s blood, processing it to concentrate the platelets, and then injecting it back into the skin or scalp to promote healing and rejuvenation. Our skilled dermatologists will tailor your treatment plan to your specific needs, ensuring optimal results.
Morpheus Skin Tightening
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars : Morpheus Skin Tightening is your answer to a more youthful, radiant you. This non-invasive treatment combines the power of microneedling and radiofrequency energy to rejuvenate your skin from within.
Chemical Peel Pack
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars : A chemical peel involves applying a chemical solution to the skin, which gently exfoliates the top layers. This process stimulates the production of new skin cells, resulting in a smoother, more youthful complexion. At Nhance, we have a variety of chemical peels such as hands or legs, upperlip, face and neck, or for your abdominal region. It is a non-invasive procedure that will help you improve the overall texture of your skin.
Laser Hair Removal
Concern - Hair removal : Tired of the constant hassle of shaving, waxing, or plucking? Our laser hair removal technology removes unwanted hair by targeting the hair follicles and inhibiting future hair growth. Be it for half face, lower neck, chin or bikini hair removal, our skilled dermatologists gently and effectively reduce hair growth, leaving you with long-lasting results.
Vampire Facial
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars : Our Vampire facial is a facial treatment involving microneedling followed by the application of Platelet-Rich Plasma (PRP). The PRP is derived from the patient’s own blood and promotes healing and rejuvenation.
Radio Surgery
Concern - Warts and Skin Tags : Tired of unsightly skin lesions, warts, or moles Radio Surgery utilizes high-frequency radio waves to target and remove skin imperfections with minimal damage to surrounding tissues.
Botox
Concern - Anti Ageing, Dull Skin : At Nhance, we offer Botox, a non-surgical solution to help you achieve a more youthful appearance. Botulinum toxin (Botox) injections are used to temporarily reduce or eliminate facial wrinkles and fine lines by relaxing the underlying muscles.
Tattoo Removal
Concern - Tattoo Removal : Tattoos, once a symbol of individuality and rebellion, can sometimes become a burden. At Nhance, we understand that life changes, and so do your desires. Our advanced laser tattoo removal procedure breaks down the ink particles in the tattoo, which are then naturally eliminated by the body.
Comedone Extraction
Concern - Acne and Acne Scars, Dull Skin : Tired of those pesky blackheads and whiteheads that seem to pop up out of nowhere? Comedone extraction is a meticulous procedure designed to remove blackheads and whiteheads from your skin. Our skilled experts use sterile tools to gently extract these impurities, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.
QR678
Concern - Hair loss : Imagine a world where your hair is revitalized, thicker, and more vibrant. QR 678 is not just a treatment; it's a promise. It's a promise to restore your hair's natural beauty, to reignite your confidence, and to help you feel like yourself again.
MNRFs (Micro Needling Radio Frequency)
Concern - Stretch Marks, Anti Ageing, Dull Skin, Acne and Acne Scars : MNRF is a revolutionary skincare treatment that combines the power of microneedling and radiofrequency energy. It involves the use of tiny needles to create microscopic channels in the skin. This process triggers the body's natural healing response, stimulating collagen and elastin production. Simultaneously, radiofrequency energy is delivered deep into the dermis, further enhancing skin tightening and rejuvenation.
Hair Transplant
Concern - Hair loss : Hair loss can be a daunting experience, affecting both men and women. A hair transplant is a surgical procedure that restores hair growth by transplanting hair follicles from a donor area (usually the back of your head) to a balding or thinning area.

About Nhance

Imagine a world where skin and hair are more than just physical attributes. They're reflections of your inner beauty, your confidence, and your overall well-being. At Nhance, we believe that everyone deserves to feel empowered by their appearance.

We're not just a clinic; we're a movement. Rooted in the trusted legacy of Narayana Health, our mission is to redefine the way people approach skin and hair care. We've created a space where dermatology, aesthetics, and cosmetology converge, offering a holistic approach to your beauty journey.

Why Choose Nhance?

When you choose Nhance, you're not just selecting a clinic; you're embarking on a journey to rediscover your radiance. Our

 commitment to personalized care, advanced technology, and a holistic approach sets us apart. Experience the Nhance difference

 today and unlock your full potential.

Personalized Care

Our experts create personalized treatment plans for your unique skin and hair concerns

Cutting-Edge Technology

Our clinic uses the latest FDA-approved technology for the safest and most effective treatments

Holistic Approach

We believe true beauty comes from within, focusing on the root causes of your skin and hair concerns

A Legacy of Trust

Backed by Narayana Health, we bring trust, excellence, and patient-centered care to every interaction.

Frequently asked questions
How do I know which treatment is right for me?
We understand that every person’s skin and hair needs are unique. That’s why we offer personalized consultations. Our experts will assess your concerns, discuss your goals, and recommend a treatment plan tailored just for you.
What services do you offer at your skin and hair clinic?
At our clinic, we provide a range of dermatology, aesthetic, and cosmetology services. From acne treatments, anti-aging solutions, and laser therapies to hair restoration, chemical peels, and advanced skincare, our focus is on helping you look and feel your best.
Are your treatments safe?
Absolutely. All our treatments are performed by doctors themselves or closely supervised by them, using the latest technologies (FDA approved) and highest-quality products. Your safety and comfort are our top priorities, and we follow strict protocols to ensure everything is done in a safe and hygienic environment.
How long will it take to see results?
Results vary depending on the treatment and your individual skin or hair condition. Some treatments, like facials or peels, can give you an instant glow, while others, such as hair restoration or laser treatments, might take a few sessions to show noticeable improvement. During your consultation, we’ll give you a clear idea of what to expect.
Does laser hair reduction hurt?
Most people experience minimal discomfort during laser hair reduction. It’s often compared to a slight snapping feeling on the skin, but our advanced lasers are designed to be as comfortable as possible. We also offer cooling mechanisms and numbing creams to help reduce any sensation.
How do I prepare for my appointment?
We’ll guide you through specific pre-treatment instructions depending on the service you're coming in for. For example, if you’re getting laser hair reduction, we might ask you to avoid sun exposure and shave the area being treated. Don’t worry—we’ll give you all the details before your visit!
How many sessions do I need?
This really depends on the treatment. Some treatments, like chemical peels, may only require one session, while others, like laser hair removal or hair restoration, may need multiple sessions to achieve optimal results. We’ll walk you through the process during your consultation and create a customized plan based on your needs.
Will there be downtime after the treatment?
Many of our treatments have little to no downtime, meaning you can get back to your day right away. However, some treatments like chemical peels or laser therapy might leave mild redness or sensitivity for a short time. We’ll make sure you know what to expect before and after your treatment.
Can I book an appointment for multiple treatments on the same day?
Yes! We offer flexible appointment scheduling so you can combine treatments if needed. If you’re interested in a combination of services, just let us know, and we’ll help you plan the perfect self-care day.
How do I take care of my skin/hair after treatment?
Post-treatment care is super important! We’ll give you all the instructions you need to protect and nourish your skin or hair after your session. This could include using specific products, avoiding sun exposure, or following a gentle skincare routine. Don’t worry, we’ll keep it simple and easy to follow.
Do you offer packages or membership plans?
Yes, we offer a variety of packages and membership plans that provide great value if you’re looking for ongoing treatments. Whether it’s skincare maintenance or a series of hair restoration sessions, our team can help you choose a plan that fits your goals and budget.
What should I do if I have a skin or hair emergency?
If you have a sudden skin or hair issue, such as an allergic reaction, a severe breakout, or unexpected hair loss, give us a call immediately. Our team is here to help you find a solution as quickly as possible, and we’ll guide you through any steps you should take before your visit.
Can I consult with a dermatologist online?
Yes! We offer virtual consultations for those who prefer to discuss their skin or hair concerns from the comfort of their home. You’ll receive the same personalized advice and treatment recommendations, all without having to visit the clinic.
How do I book an appointment?
Booking an appointment is easy! You can either call us directly on 7026222222, use our online booking system from the NH Care App, or send us a message through WhatsApp. Arya Healths can also book your appointments via your care coordinators. If you’re unsure about which treatment to book, don’t hesitate to reach out—we’re here to help you every step of the way.
What if I need to cancel or reschedule my appointment?
If you need to cancel or reschedule, just let us konw and we’ll be happy to find another time that works for you.

EAR, NOSE, AND THROAT (ENT)
Overview

The ENT department at Narayana One Health provides comprehensive care for conditions affecting the ear, nose, and throat, as well as related structures in the head and neck. Our skilled Otorhinolaryngologist offer expert diagnosis, treatment, and management of ENT disorders, ranging from common concerns like sinusitis and hearing loss to complex issues such as voice disorders, thyroid problems, and sleep apnea. We cater to patients of all ages, including children, with a focus on compassionate, patient-centric care. Whether for routine evaluations or advanced treatments, our team ensures improved health outcomes and quality of life.

Book Appointment
ENT Specialists at Narayana One Health Excel in
Diagnosis and Treatment of Ear Disorders

Expert management of conditions related to hearing, balance, infections, and tinnitus.

Nose and Sinus Management

Comprehensive care for allergies, sinus infections, and nasal obstructions.

Throat and Voice Disorders

Diagnosis and treatment of issues like swallowing difficulties, hoarseness, and vocal cord conditions.

Pediatric ENT Care

Specialised care for children with recurrent ear infections, tonsillitis, or other ENT conditions.

Allergy and Immunology

Relief from chronic sinus issues and allergic rhinitis through personalised allergy management.

Sleep Medicine

Addressing sleep apnea and snoring for improved sleep quality.

Thyroid and Parathyroid Management

Expert diagnosis and treatment for thyroid and parathyroid disorders.

Tailored solutions including medication, lifestyle changes, or minimally invasive procedures.

04
Therapeutic Interventions

Medications, allergy shots, or surgeries for chronic conditions.

05
Follow-Up Care

Regular visits to monitor progress, prevent recurrence, and provide long-term support.

When to Consult an ENT Specialist

 

Persistent ear pain, hearing loss, or ringing in the ears.
Chronic sinus infections or difficulty breathing through the nose.
Sore throat, hoarseness, or voice changes lasting over two weeks.
Frequent dizziness or balance problems.
Allergic symptoms like nasal congestion and sneezing that disrupt daily life.
Pain or difficulty swallowing.
Symptoms of sleep apnea, including loud snoring or daytime fatigue.
Unexplained neck swelling, fatigue, or weight changes linked to thyroid disorders.

ORTHOPAEDICS
Overview

Orthopaedics focuses on diagnosing, treating, and managing disorders of the musculoskeletal system, encompassing bones, joints, muscles, ligaments, and tendons. At Narayana One Health, our orthopaedic specialists deliver expert care for injuries, chronic conditions, and age-related issues. Whether it's fractures, sports injuries, or degenerative diseases like arthritis, our team provides both surgical and non-surgical solutions tailored to your needs. We aim to ensure faster recovery, enhanced mobility, andimproved quality of life for our patients, including children and adults.

Book Appointment
Orthopaedic Specialists at Narayana One Health Excel In:
Fracture Management

Precise care for bone fractures, ensuring optimal healing and alignment.

Sports Injuries

Specialised treatment for ligament tears, sprains, and rotator cuff injuries to help you return to an active lifestyle.

Arthritis Care

Comprehensive management of osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, and related joint disorders.

Spinal Disorders

Diagnosis and treatment for slipped discs, scoliosis, and spinal stenosis to alleviate back and neck pain.

Paediatric Orthopaedics

Expert care for congenital deformities such as clubfoot and hip dysplasia, as well as growth plate injuries in children.

Osteoporosis Treatment

Prevention, diagnosis, and management of brittle bones to reduce fracture risks in adults.

Post-Surgical Rehabilitation

Structured recovery plans to restore strength and mobility after orthopaedic surgery.

Pain and Injury Prevention

Guidance on maintaining joint health and preventing injuries through lifestyle modifications.

Customised recovery plans to regain strength, mobility, and overall function.

06

Treatments to relieve discomfort and enhance daily activities.

07
Follow-Up and Prevention

Regular monitoring and preventive advice to maintain musculoskeletal health.

When to Consult an Orthopaedic Specialist

Visit an orthopaedic specialist if you or your child experience:

 

Persistent joint or muscle pain.
Swelling, stiffness, or reduced mobility in any joint.
Recurrent back or neck pain.
Symptoms of arthritis, including joint pain and morning stiffness.
Difficulty performing daily activities due to pain or restricted movement.
Frequent fractures or other signs of osteoporosis.
Sports injuries affecting performance or mobility.
Pain or instability following a previous injury.
Growth abnormalities or unexplained pain in children’s bones or joints.
Expert Orthopaedic Care for Better Mobility

At Narayana One Health, we are committed to delivering compassionate, expert orthopaedic care. Our specialists strive to restore your mobility and enhance your quality of life through advanced, patient-centred treatments.

ADULT AND PAEDIATRIC VACCINATION
Why Vaccinate?

Vaccination is a simple, safe, and effective way of protecting you against harmful diseases, before you come into contact with them. 
Vaccination is essential for everyone, from infants to seniors, offering protection against severe illnesses that can be difficult to treat later in life. Here’s why you should vaccinate:

Early Protection for Children: Establishes immunity against contagious and potentially deadly diseases.
Health Safeguard for Adults: Reduces the risk of severe illness, complications, and hospitalizations. 
Community Health: Contributes to herd immunity, protecting vulnerable groups like infants, elderly, and those unable to be vaccinated.
Why Choose Narayana One Health for Your Vaccination Needs?

Expert guidance to determine who should take the vaccine and the optimal timing for it.

Post-Vaccination Support

Follow-up consultations to address any potential side effects.

Covers the vaccine, pricking charges, and consumables, ensuring a safe and complete vaccination experience.

Government-Approved Vaccines

All vaccines are certified, ensuring maximum safety.

Convenience and Care

Experienced professionals offer efficient, hassle-free vaccination services.

Adult Vaccination
Paediatric Vaccination
Flu Vaccine
₹1,777 (Members), ₹2,222 (Non-Members)
Who Should Take It?

The flu vaccine is recommended annually for all individuals, particularly high-risk groups like young children, pregnant women, seniors, and people with weakened immune systems.

Why Vaccinate?

Flu symptoms can lead to severe complications, including pneumonia, especially in vulnerable groups. Vaccination helps reduce the severity and spread of the flu virus, protecting you and those around you.

Book Now
Shingles Vaccine (Herpes Zoster)
₹8,799 (Members), ₹10,999 (Non-Members)
Who Should Take It?

Adults over 50, and anyone at risk for reactivation of the herpes zoster virus, are advised to get the shingles vaccine. You may consult your family doctor regarding the same.

Why Vaccinate?

The shingles vaccine prevents reactivation of the virus that causes chickenpox, which can lead to a painful rash and long-term nerve pain (postherpetic neuralgia). Protection is essential for aging adults who are more susceptible to severe complications.

Book Now
HPV Vaccine
Cervavac (Serum Institute) - ₹1,600 (Members), ₹2,000 (Non-Members)
Gardasil (MSD) - ₹3,140 (Members), ₹3,927 (Non-Members)
Gardasil 9 (MSD) - ₹8,680 (Members), ₹10,850 (Non-Members)
Who Should Take It?

The HPV vaccine is most effective when administered to preteens and adolescents, generally recommended for boys and girls aged 9-14.

Why Vaccinate?

The HPV vaccine protects against the human papillomavirus, which can lead to cervical cancer and other HPV-related cancers. Early vaccination reduces the risk of HPV-related cancers, ensuring a healthier future.

Book Now
Pneumococcal Vaccine
₹1,824 (Members), ₹2,280 (Non-Members)
Who Should Take It?

This vaccine is recommended for young children, adults over 65, and individuals with chronic health conditions or weakened immunity.

Why Vaccinate?

The pneumococcal vaccine protects against infections caused by Streptococcus pneumoniae, including pneumonia, meningitis, and bloodstream infections, which can be life-threatening for high-risk individuals.

Cancer Care
CANCER CARE
About Cancer Care

Cancer refers to any one of a large number of diseases characterized by the development of abnormal cells that divide uncontrollably and have the ability to infiltrate and destroy normal body tissue. Cancer often has the ability to spread throughout your body.

Our clinic offers expert chemotherapy infusion services with personalized
care, skilled oncologists, and a comfortable setting for safe cancer treatment. Trust our specialized team for compassionate care and advanced oncology
solutions.

Book Appointment
Symptoms

Signs and symptoms caused by cancer will vary depending on what part of the body is affected. Some general signs and symptoms associated with, but not specific to, cancer, include:

 

Fatigue
Lump or under the skin
Unintended weight loss or gain
Skin changes, such as yellowing, darkening or redness, or sores that won't heal, or changes to existing moles
Changes in bowel or bladder habits
Persistent cough or trouble breathing
Difficulty swallowing
Persistent hoarseness
Muscle or joint pain
Continued fevers or night sweats
Constant bleeding or bruising
Know When to Consult a Doctor

Make an appointment with your doctor if you have any persistent signs or symptoms that concern you. If you don't have any signs or symptoms, but are worried about your risk of cancer, discuss your concerns with your doctor. Ask about which cancer screening tests and procedures are appropriate for you.

Book An Appointment
Oncology Services at Narayana One Health

We provide a hassle-free cancer treatment experience with unwavering support from diagnosis to completion. Our specialists ensure you and your family are well-guided at every step. Your doctor will:

 

Explain your diagnosis and cancer stage clearly
Discuss treatment options and recommend the best course
Offer compassionate, high-quality care
Manage pain, symptoms, and side effects to maintain your quality of life
Book An Appointment
Consultation with our Oncologist
Chemotherapy
Targeted Therapy
Immunotherapy
Chemotherapy
Immunotherapy
Targeted Therapy
Chemotherapy

Chemotherapy is the most commonly used treatment for cancer. It involves using drugs that destroy cancer cells by entirely stopping or slowing down their growth. Chemotherapy is generally used to treat recurrent cancers (when cancer cells reemerge after treatment) or metastatic cancers (cancer cells that spread to other parts of the body).

 

Chemotherapy drugs can be administered orally, intravenously, or injected directly into the fluid surrounding the brain or the abdominal cavity, depending on the specific diagnosis.

There Are Three Types of Chemotherapy
Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy

Usually done before the surgical or radiation procedures. It is recommended when the tumours are too big to be operated or when the location of the tumour is difficult to operate. The drugs used in Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy reduce the size of the tumour to enable surgery.

Adjuvant Chemotherapy

Delivered after surgical or radiation procedures. It helps clean up any remaining cancer cells that are not visible in the imaging tests. This treatment helps to reduce the chances of recurrence of cancer.

Palliative Chemotherapy

This is recommended to manage the symptoms of chronic cancer to improve quality of life.

Side-Effects of Chemotherapy

Apart from destroying the cancerous cells, chemotherapy drugs also tend to destroy the rapidly dividing healthy cells present in the intestines, mouth, etc., which results in some side effects. The side effects of chemotherapy generally disappear once the treatment ends. Some side effects of chemotherapy include:

Hair loss
Vomiting or nausea
Anaemia
Fatigue
Diarrhoea
Mouth sores
Low platelet count
Book An Appointment
Our Facility
Advanced cancer care you can trust

Remember that medical science is making rapid progress, with new and improved cancer treatments being introduced regularly. Our oncologists make sure they stay updated on the latest developments in cancer treatment so they can provide you with the best possible oncology services. Don’t hesitate to ask the cancer doctor any questions that you or your family might have to ensure peace of mind during treatment.

What is Preventive Healthcare?

Preventive Healthcare is a proactive step towards a healthier you. It's a routine examination that helps identify potential health issues early on, even before symptoms arise.

Through tests such as blood work, cholesterol screenings, blood pressure checks, and physical exams, we can assess your overall well-being and detect early signs of conditions like heart disease, diabetes, and cancer. Remember, even if you feel fine, regular checkups are essential, as many health problems often begin silently.

Shield Your Future: Embrace Preventive Healthcare

Discover the Importance of Regular Health Checkups for a Healthier Tomorrow

17 Oct 2021
22 min read
Share 

Do you often feel extra tired or stressed, even when you haven’t done anything mentally or physically exhausting? Or maybe you’ve noticed a bit of discomfort that doesn’t seem severe enough to check out, yet it lingers, affecting your daily life. Often, these minor but persistent symptoms are our body’s way of signalling underlying issues that could worsen if ignored.

This is where preventive healthcare comes in. It helps you take charge early, detecting health risks through regular checkups and screenings before they escalate. It safeguards against future complications, enhances your vitality, and fortifies your well-being. Staying proactive with your preventive healthcare steps, you can tackle many issues even before the occurrence of symptoms.

While we all understand “why is healthcare important,” there remains a significant lack of attention to preventive healthcare, which is concerning.

 

Preventive Care for Adults: Symptoms and Screenings

Various symptom-specific screenings can help pinpoint potential issues, aiding in early detection and timely intervention. For example, persistent fatigue might be linked to anaemia, low vitamin levels, or even early signs of diabetes. Screenings for this may include:

A simple blood test can check for deficiencies in essential vitamins
A blood glucose test can screen for diabetes

These tests help catch the issues before they become severe.  

Similarly, fluctuating blood pressure might indicate hypertension or an early risk for cardiovascular disease, which can be managed effectively with regular monitoring and lifestyle adjustments if detected early

Preventive healthcare services provide essential insights that go beyond visible symptoms. 

Regular blood pressure checks, cholesterol assessments, and blood glucose tests offer a window into your heart and metabolic health
Cardiovascular screenings, such as EKGs and stress tests, are invaluable for those with risk factors, like a sedentary lifestyle or family history, and can uncover issues that may not yet present symptoms

By staying proactive with the screenings and tests, you can manage your health more effectively, preventing or mitigating severe conditions. With a holistic approach to preventive care, you can stay informed and take control of your well-being before issues progress.

 

Preventive Healthcare: Understanding its Benefits

Many wonder if preventive healthcare truly makes a difference.  

Think of preventive care as a proactive approach to your health. It's designed to keep issues at bay rather than waiting for symptoms to appear. It's more than just checkups—it's an ongoing commitment to staying well and addressing any risks early.

1. Fewer Health Complications 

One of the most valuable aspects of preventive healthcare is its role in catching potential health concerns before they escalate. Routine screenings, such as blood pressure or diabetes checks, are subtle yet powerful tools that help identify problems early. Preventive steps, such as vaccinations, can also protect you from specific diseases altogether, allowing you to focus on enjoying life without worrying about avoidable health problems. 

2. Reduced Healthcare Costs Over Time

The concern about the rising cost of healthcare is evident and justified, too. Addressing potential health issues early minimises the need for more intensive, costly treatments down the road. For instance, a simple vaccination can shield you from a disease that might otherwise lead to extended hospital stays and expensive interventions.

3. A More Active, Productive Life

Staying healthy isn’t just about avoiding illness; it’s about living a fulfilling life. Preventive care allows you to remain active, engaged, and ready to embrace each day. By maintaining good health, you’re better able to pursue the things that matter most to you. Regular checkups and healthy habits keep you physically and mentally sharp.

4. Overall Physical and Mental Well-being

Preventive healthcare is a holistic approach to well-being. For example, regular exercise helps keep your muscles strong and your mind clear. Coupled with preventive checkups and lifestyle guidance, it becomes easier to maintain a balanced, healthy lifestyle.

5. Lower Stress Levels and Peace of Mind

An often-overlooked benefit of preventive healthcare is the peace of mind it brings. Knowing your health is monitored regularly can ease any lingering anxieties about potential health issues. Preventive care is not about endless doctor visits—it’s about creating a sustainable path to better health.

 

Why Consider Practicing Preventive Healthcare?

There are some definite reasons to consider practicing preventive care.

Weight Management: Maintaining a healthy weight is essential to reducing various health risks, including diabetes, hypertension, and heart disease. Eat healthy and exercise regularly to prevent obesity
Identifying Potential Issues Early: Annual checkups and routine blood tests are crucial for preventive healthcare. Some mandatory physical checkups should include cholesterol, blood pressure, cancer, diabetes, PCOD, bone density, etc.
For Your Mental Well-being: Mental wellness is a vital aspect of preventive healthcare. It can address anxiety, depression, and other concerns before they escalate
Staying Protected: Staying current on immunisations protects against infectious diseases, particularly for vulnerable populations. Vaccines do not just protect you. They protect all of us from spreading infectious and contagious diseases

 

Preventive Healthcare: Who Are the Most Vulnerable Populations?

Preventive healthcare is crucial for maintaining long-term health, and specific populations can significantly benefit from it. 

Let’s understand who can benefit the most from preventive healthcare.

1. People with Chronic Conditions

Individuals living with chronic health conditions, such as diabetes, hypertension, asthma, or cardiovascular disease, require ongoing preventive healthcare. This includes:

Monitoring vital signs,
Adjusting medications, and  
Receiving regular screenings for potential complications associated with their condition

2. People with Unhealthy Lifestyles

Individuals who lead sedentary lifestyles, have poor dietary habits, or smoke or consume alcohol excessively are at a higher risk for a range of health problems. Preventive healthcare for these individuals can include:  

Counselling on lifestyle changes,
Regular screenings for metabolic conditions, and 
Guidance on nutritional improvements and physical activity

3. Individuals with a Family History of Health Conditions

People with a family history of diseases like cancer, heart disease, or autoimmune conditions are more likely to develop these conditions themselves.

Genetic screenings,
Regular checkups, and 
Specific preventive measures, such as colonoscopies or mammograms, are recommended to catch potential issues before they progress

4. People in High-Stress Jobs

High-stress occupations, such as those in healthcare, law enforcement, and corporate environments, can take a toll on mental and physical health, leading to conditions like hypertension, burnout, and depression. Preventive healthcare for individuals in these roles includes:

Mental health support, 
Stress management strategies, 
Regular blood pressure and heart health screenings, and  
Wellness programmes

5. Elderly Individuals

Ageing naturally increases the risk of chronic conditions such as heart disease, diabetes, osteoporosis, and certain cancers. Elderly individuals benefit significantly from preventive healthcare measures like:  

Regular screenings, 
Bone density tests, 
Blood pressure monitoring, and 
Vaccinations (e.g., flu and pneumonia vaccines)

 

When to Consult

Ready to take control of your health and catch potential issues before they start? It is time to consult a general physician right away! Guided preventive care can be a decisive step in protecting your future well-being. A doctor can help you assess your unique health risks and recommend screenings that fit your needs, helping you stay a step ahead.  

Don’t wait for symptoms to appear—schedule an appointment today to create a personalised preventive care plan that supports a healthier, more fulfilling life. 

 

In a Nutshell

Preventive healthcare is a proactive strategy for maintaining your overall health and restraining certain illnesses. By scheduling regular screenings, making informed lifestyle choices, and staying abreast with vaccinations, you can reduce your risk of chronic diseases and improve your quality of life. 

Take preventive healthcare as seriously as you take medications and hospitalisations. Only prevention will save you from stress, tiredness, and expenses. It will lead you to live a healthier and more fulfilling life.  

 

FAQs

1. What’s the difference between a preventive test and a diagnostic test? 

Preventive tests screen asymptomatic individuals for early signs of disease. On the contrary, diagnostic tests identify diseases with specific symptoms. Diagnostic tests help confirm a disease. 

2. When should I schedule preventive care screenings? 

Frequency depends on your health, age, and risk factors. Annual checkups are generally recommended. However, certain screenings, like mammograms or cholesterol checks, follow specific age guidelines.

3. Does insurance cover preventive care?

Many insurance plans cover preventive care services. However, coverage specifics can vary. Reviewing your plan’s details or consulting with your provider can clarify the included services. 

4. What are the characteristics of preventive care?

Preventive care involves screenings, immunisations, counselling, and lifestyle recommendations. These aim to avert disease and support long-term health. 

5. What are the characteristics of preventive care?

Preventive care helps catch health concerns early, reduces healthcare expenses, and supports a healthier life by addressing risks proactively.

What is Preventive Healthcare?

Preventive Healthcare is a proactive step towards a healthier you. It's a routine examination that helps identify potential health issues early on, even before symptoms arise.

Through tests such as blood work, cholesterol screenings, blood pressure checks, and physical exams, we can assess your overall well-being and detect early signs of conditions like heart disease, diabetes, and cancer. Remember, even if you feel fine, regular checkups are essential, as many health problems often begin silently.

Individuals With Existing Health Conditions

Regular checkups are essential for monitoring chronic conditions like high blood pressure or diabetes.

Family History of Chronic Diseases

If conditions like heart disease or diabetes run in your family, checkups can help detect and manage risks.

Unhealthy Lifestyle Choices

Smoking, inactivity, or being overweight? Preventive healthcare can help manage potential health risks.

People With High Stress Levels or Sleep Issues

Stress and poor sleep can affect your overall health and may need to be monitored.

Anyone Experiencing Symptoms

If you notice unexplained fatigue, weight changes, or other symptoms, it’s wise to have a preventive checkup.

People Who Feel Healthy

Even if you feel well, early detection is key to preventing future health issues.

Holistic Women’s Health with Professional Guidance

A holistic approach to women’s health, combining advanced medical expertise with personalized care to support overall wellness and balance.

About Us
Our Story
Our Legacy

Narayana One Health is a part of Narayana Health, a trusted and revered healthcare organization, founded by the renowned Dr. Devi Shetty and trusted for its enduring legacy of excellence

Our Vision

To be your Healthcare Partner that brings together trusted Health Care, convenient Health Services, and seamless Health Insurance into Member Plans

Our Mission

To create products and services that ensure you have access to quality healthcare that is simple, trusted, personalized, and at a great value

A Comprehensive Healthcare Solution For You
Primary to Tertiary Care

Narayana Health provides seamless healthcare, starting with preventive care and routine check-ups at our network of Narayana Clinics to complex procedures at our hospitals, if required

Single point for all healthcare needs

Narayana One Health is your single point to meet your Health Care, Health Services and Health Insurance requirements. Clinics, Pharmacies, Doctors, Membership plans, Labs, Diagnostics, Insurance and much more to keep you healthy

Renowned specialists at your fingertips

At Narayana One Health, you have access to an exhaustive network of highly qualified and experienced doctors across various disciplines. Find the right doctor for your specific needs

Integrated excellence, backed by technology

Experience the ease of integrated care at Narayana One Health. Our services are seamlessly connected, allowing you to effortlessly navigate from consultations to diagnostics, treatment plans, and pharmacy needs–all under one roof or through our convenient NH Care App
