Frequently Asked Questions
I already have a corporate cover with my employer. Why should I buy Arya Health Plan?

While your corporate health cover offers some protection, it's important to remember that it's tied to your employment and may not fully meet your healthcare needs. Here’s why:

 

You will lose your coverage should you change jobs.
The sum insured may not be enough to cover major expenses.
Restrictions on room type and rent could limit your comfort.
Essential consumables like bandages and syringes (which make up 10-15% of your bill) often may not be covered.
Routine care may have little to no coverage.
There's typically no proactive support to keep you healthy in the long run.

 

That's why having an Arya Health Plan 1 is so important. Taking this step now gives you peace of mind, knowing you're taken care when you are healthy and protected no matter what life brings.

I want to understand how does top-up work?

Consider that you have a corporate cover of Rs 2 lac with your employer and you wish to top-up this 2 Lac coverage to 50 Lac of coverage with Arya Health Plan 1

 

This is how it will work:

1. You will only pay for coverage of only INR 48 Lacs for Arya Health Plan and receive great savings on premium!
2. In case of hospitalization claim, your corporate cover will take care of the initial INR 2 Lacs of bill, post which Arya Health Plan coverage will trigger, and pay eligible expenses up to the remaining INR 48 Lacs.

 

In summary, you will be buying Arya Health Plan with a deductible of Rs 2 lacs.


Following deductible options are available:
- INR 25,000
- INR 50,000
- INR 1,00,000
- INR 2,00,000
- INR 5,00,000

I already have an existing retail health insurance. Why should I buy Arya Health plan?

It's great that you already have a retail health insurance plan for yourself and your family—this is an important step in protecting your health. But is it sufficient? We believe it’s not as they are not comprehensive enough, have limits on coverage, have confusing T&Cs​ leading to poor experience at time of claim.

 

Arya Health Plan 1 goes beyond typical coverage and are designed not only to cover you when you're sick but also to help keep you healthy. We’re committed to your well-being, so if you fall sick and need surgery despite our efforts, we’ll refund your entire yearly premium on top of covering all your hospital bills guaranteeing Zero out-of-pocket expenses. This way, you can focus solely on recovery, while we take care of everything else.

Why is a health check-up required before buying Arya Health Plan 1

We are your partners in helping you get well and stay healthy. To do so, we both need to understand your current health. Our Care Management team will support you step by step to help you adhere to your doctor-directed health management plan. Together, your doctor, our team, and you will work to keep you out of the hospital. 

 

Once you have completed your initial health check-up and we have accepted you for coverage, your policy can never be cancelled (as long as you pay the due premium on time), regardless of future changes to your health. This way, you can have peace of mind knowing there won’t be any unexpected claim rejections.

Will the price increase because of the health checkup?

There are no additional payments required by you to get the health check-up done.

 

However, depending on the results of the health check-up, your premium may increase if health markers suggests that your current health condition in outside normal parameters.

 

In certain cases, we may defer the issuance of subscription for Arya Health Plan 1 and Plan 2 and coverage.

Which family members can be added to the plan?

Self, Spouse, Children (>3 months to 25 years), Parents and Parents-in-law

What does the OneHealth Promise benefit in Arya Health Plan 1 ?

It's our job to keep you healthy - and out of the hospital. That's why we will return your premium if you get hospitalized for a surgery due to a health issue as an Arya Health Plan member.

Which hospitals and clinics is covered under Arya Health Plan?

For hospitalization, your coverage extends to all 21 Narayana Health hospitals across India.

 

For routine care (OPD), you're covered at all Narayana One Health Clinics and Narayana Health hospitals.

Do I need to pay myself for consumables like bandages, syringes, etc.for hospitalization?

No, you don't need to pay.

 

Consumables and non-medical expenses during hospitalization are covered with Arya Health Plan 1, guaranteeing Zero out-of-pocket expenses from your end.

 

Consumables and non-medical expenses typically make up 10-15% of your hospital bill. Most insurance products do not provide cover for this.

What room-type and room-rent for hospitalization will I be covered for?

At Narayana Health, there are no limits on room type or room rent.

 

We understand that your comfort is a top priority during challenging times, and we ensure you have the flexibility to choose the room that suits you best.

Can I port my policy to Arya Health Plan?

Yes, you can port your existing policy to Arya Health Plan.

Can I use an Arya health plan outside of Narayana Health network?

Yes, your Arya health plan provides coverage outside the Narayana Health network in specific situations.​

While we recommend using the Narayana Health network for seamless coverage, we understand that there are times when this may not be possible. In such cases, we’ve got you covered:​

 

1.  Medical Emergencies: If you are travelling and the Narayana Health network is unavailable at your location.​

2. Travel Situations: If you’re travelling and there’s no Narayana Health facility nearby.​

3. Unavailability of Treatment: If the required treatment isn’t offered within the Narayana Health network at that time.​

4. Relocation: If you’ve moved to a new location where Narayana Health facilities are unavailable.​

 

For any claims or queries, feel free to reach out to our support team.

What sum insured does Arya health plan have?

We have multiple sum insured options ranging from ₹25 Lacs up to ₹1Crore.​

What happens in case of emergency or travel if treatment is taken at other out-of-network hospitals?

Our primary purpose is to provide you with healthcare whenever you need it. While we require you to seek treatment within the Narayana Health network for coverage, we also provide coverage outside the network in the following scenarios:​

 

In case of an emergency, when you seek care at the nearest hospital, please refer to the points below for the definition of an emergency:​

1.  If you are travelling and the Narayana Health network is unavailable at your location.​
2. If the required treatment is not available within the Narayana Health network.​
3. If you have relocated to a new location where Narayana Health is unavailable.

How do I claim with Arya health plan?

For planned admissions, please call us so we can prepare everything for you in advance. At the Hospital, you will be supported by our care team at every step of the way. Alternately, please present the Digital Health Card we issue at the Insurance Desk, and we'll handle the rest. We want you to feel comfortable and focus solely on your recovery, while we take care of everything else.

Brief Profile

Dr. Prabhakar Hegde is a highly experienced Internal Medicine specialist with over 15 years of practice in diagnosing and managing a wide range of complex medical conditions. Holding an MBBS and MD in General Medicine, along with a Fellowship from the American College of Physicians (FACP), Dr. Hegde is proficient in treating conditions such as hypertension, diabetes, hyperlipidemia, and thyroid disorders. He is fluent in Kannada and English, allowing him to connect with a broad patient base.

 

Known for his meticulous approach to diagnosis and compassionate care, Dr. Hegde specializes in managing chronic illnesses, including COPD, asthma, heart disease, and kidney disease. His areas of expertise also extend to treating infectious diseases and gastrointestinal disorders. Committed to staying updated with the latest medical advancements, Dr. Hegde actively participates in research and has published numerous papers in the field of internal medicine.

title: Your Questions Answered at Narayana One Health FAQ
content:
Become an Arya Member
Home
FAQ's
FREQUENTLY
ASKED
QUESTIONS
Health Care
Services
Arya Health Plan
One Health Score
Health Care
How can I book an appointment at your clinic?

You can easily schedule an appointment by either calling our support line at 7026 222 222 or by using our NH Care app. 

What is the procedure for rescheduling or cancelling appointments?

To reschedule or cancel your appointment, simply access the NH Care app or reach out to us at 7026 222 222. 

Is there an option for online appointment booking?

Yes, for your convenience, we offer online appointment booking through our NH Care app or  via our website. 

Can I check the availability of specific doctors or specialists before booking?

 Our NH Care app’s online booking system enables you to check the availability of doctors and specialists, allowing you to choose a suitable appointment slot that fits your schedule. 

What services and treatments do you offer at your clinics?

At our clinics, we offer a comprehensive range of medical services and treatments, including consultations, diagnostics, vaccinations, preventive care, and chronic disease management. 

Are there any special packages or programs for specific health conditions?

We offer specialized programs and packages tailored to address various health conditions such as diabetes management, wellness checkups, and women's health. 

Do you provide video consultation services for remote patients?

Yes, we offer video consultations services with select doctors at our clinics, catering to patients who prefer remote consultations or are unable to visit the clinic in person. 

Are walk-in appointments available, or do I need to book an appointment in advance?

Yes, we do accept walk-in appointments. However, booking an appointment in advance is recommended to avoid waiting times. 

What special services do Narayana Clinics offer at their locations in Electronic City, HSR Layout, and Langford?

In addition to our core services, our clinics in Electronic City, HSR Layout, and Langford provide specialised care options like dialysis, cancer care, and skin & hair treatments. 

Can I get laboratory tests and diagnostics done at your clinic?

For your comfort and peace of mind, we have a well-equipped on-site laboratory. This enables us to perform a wide range of CAP accredited lab tests conveniently within our clinic, ensuring Gold Standard in lab accreditation. 

How do you ensure patient privacy and confidentiality?

we strictly adhere to stringent privacy and confidentiality policies in line with healthcare regulations to safeguard patient information. 

Is there a dedicated customer support team available to assist with queries and concerns?

Our dedicated customer support team, available during clinic hours at 7026 222 222, is here to assist with any queries, concerns, or feedback you may have. Our service hours are from 8 am to 8 pm. 

Can I access my medical records or reports online through your portal?

Yes, you can securely access your medical records, reports, and prescriptions through our NH Care app . The App provides you with convenient access to your healthcare information whenever you need it.   

Do you offer full body health checkups?

Yes, we offer full body health checkups with packages tailored for different age groups.

Do you have multilingual staff or translators available for non-native speakers?

Yes, we offer multilingual support with staff and translators dedicated to assisting non-native speakers, ensuring effective communication and understanding. 

Does your healthcare package include radiology services?

Yes, our healthcare packages include radiology services. 

Are there care coordinators or patient assistants to assist with treatment plans and follow-ups?

Our clinics are equipped with care coordinators and patient assistants who collaborate closely with patients to ensure personalised treatment plans and thorough follow-ups. 

Do you offer medicine delivery to home?

Yes, we offer medicine delivery to your home for your convenience. 

What is your approach to patient education and empowerment with regard to their health?

At our clinics, we prioritise patient education and empowerment. We achieve this by providing comprehensive information, resources, and guidance to help patients make well-informed decisions about their health and well-being. 

Services
How can I access my lab reports?

Accessing your lab reports is convenient through the NH Care App. Download the app on your phone for easy access to your results anytime, anywhere.

How long does a typical health checkup take at your clinic?

Our comprehensive health checkups are designed for efficiency. The express checkup process, from registration to completion allows you to get a complete picture of your health without having to dedicate an entire day. 

Do you offer home sample collection for health checkups?

We understand the importance of convenience. As part of your health checkup, we provide free home sample collection for your blood tests. This eliminates the need for a separate visit for sample collection. cal records through the NH Care app.

Are your health checkups personalised?

We acknowledge that health needs vary by age and gender. Therefore, our health checkups are tailored based on these factors to ensure you receive the most relevant tests and screenings. 

What are the different screenings available at your clinic?

We offer a wide array of screenings to cater to diverse health concerns:   

Advanced Heart Screening 
Diabetes Screening  
Kidney Screening  
Cholesterol Check  
Liver Screening  
Thyroid Screening  
Vitamin Deficiency Screening  
Hepatitis B Virus Screening  
Iron Deficiency Screening 
Rheumatoid Screening  
Immunity Screening 
Pancreas Screening  
Cancer Screening 
What types of dialysis services do you offer?

We offer the following dialysis services: 

HSR Clinic: Haemodialysis (HD) and Hemodiafiltration (HDF) 
E-City Clinic: Haemodialysis (HD) 
Do you offer new patient consultations for dialysis?

Yes, we offer consultations for new patients requiring dialysis treatment. 

What is a typical schedule for dialysis appointments?

Dialysis appointments are typically scheduled from 7 PM to 9 PM. 

Can I access all my test reports through the NH Care App?

Yes, most reports are available on the NH Care App. However, certain sensitive reports the doctor may share directly and may not be accessible through the app. You'll receive guidance on this during your testing process. 

Arya Health Plan
Where can I purchase the One Health Member Plan?

Residents living near Narayana Clinics can purchase the plan via the NH Care App, website, or at nearby Narayana Clinics. 

What is the validity of the One Health Member Plan?

The One Health Member Plan is valid for 12 months from the date of purchase, regardless of when family members are added. 

Does the validity period for a dependent begin from the day they are added, or does it align with the primary member's 12-month period?

The validity for each member aligns with the primary member's 12-month period. 

Can I add family members to the One Health Member Plan?

Yes, you can add family members to the plan via NH Care App, website, or Narayana Clinics. Please note that membership is non-transferable once added. 

Can single or unmarried members include their siblings in the plan?

Yes, they can, provided their siblings are below 25 years old. 

Who qualifies as a family member eligible to be added to the plan?

Spouse, two children (under 25 years old), parents, and parents-in-law are considered eligible family members. 

Can I change my family members on the One Health Member Plan?

You can add up to 8 family members within a year of purchase. However, membership is non-transferable once added to ensure continuity of care.

We're a family of two members. Can we opt for a plan tailored for just 2 or 4 members instead of the 8-member plan?

We understand that a family size of two may not require coverage for eight members. While we currently don't offer tiered plans based on family size, the Narayana One Health Member Plan is designed to be a cost-effective solution for families of all sizes. 

What is the role of the Care Team?

The Care Team serves as a central point of contact for managing your family's healthcare and treatment needs. This includes appointment scheduling, coordinating home care services, overseeing treatment initiation, and providing other associated services. 

Do I have the option of choosing my Family Physician?

No. A family physician and a Care Team will be assigned to each family based on the PIN code provided at the time of purchase. The family physician will be available for both video consultations and physical consultations at the clinic tagged to your plan. 

How much can I save on family physician consultations with my plan?

Members get unlimited free consultations with the assigned family physician. 

How much can I save on specialist doctor consultations with my plan?

Members save 15% on consultations with specialist doctors across Narayana clinics and hospitals, applicable on both video and in-person appointments. 

Are there any specialities not covered by the 15% savings on specialist consultations?

The 15% savings apply to all specialities.

How much do I save on medicines?

Members save flat 20% on medicines & vaccines. However, Oncology medications are excluded from this offer, which are eligible for flat 10% savings only. Members also get flat 5% savings on FMCG. Additionally, members get 5% One Health credits (detailed later) on each transaction (all medicines including Oncology and FMCG). 

How much do I save on lab tests and diagnostics?

Members save 45% on all lab tests conducted for OPD treatments. Please note that bundled lab test services, also known as ‘packages’ or ‘proﬁles’, are not covered in the plan. Further, ECG, USG, ECHO, TMT, CT, MRI, PFT and Holter are the only diagnostic services covered in the plan. 

How much do I save on health packages?

Members save 20% on health packages costing more than ₹2500. Limited-offer packages are not eligible under this. 

How much do I save on physiotherapy and dialysis?

Members save 10% on physiotherapy and dialysis. 

How much do I save on dermatology procedures?

Members save 5% on select dermatology procedures, applicable exclusively to procedures offered at our clinics. 

How are charges calculated for home care services?

Members receive complementary doorstep care services. This includes home sample collection, medicine delivery, nurse visits, and physiotherapist visits. However, services are available only in specific serviceable areas deﬁned as locations within 5-7 kilometres of our clinic. 

What is the “Med eCHAT" feature?

The Med eCHAT feature allows Narayana One Health members to easily connect with trained healthcare professionals, such as nurses and doctors, for personalized support with non-emergency medical questions.

How can I use this feature?

You can access the Med eCHAT through the NH Care app. Just log in and start chatting with a healthcare expert for quick answers to your health queries.

What types of questions can I ask?

You can ask about prescription clarifications, allergy symptoms, medication doses, side effects, alternative medicines, and doctor availability. It's designed to help you get the information you need conveniently.

One Health Score
What is One Health Score?

One Health Score is a single score/metric that looks at your health holistically. It helps you learn more about your health via actionable insights and how can you improve your habits by learning more about 'your inside story'.

How can I try the product?

You can try the One Health Score by becoming an Arya member today.

What all aspects does it cover?

It covers 7 parameters of Nutrition, Activity, Physical health, Mindfulness, Mental wellbeing, Sleep and Self control (Refer to the flier/video for more details).

Do I need to do any test before?

You don't need to do any tests. All you need to do are answer a few simple questions and the tool will generate a score.

How can I get my score?

You need to answer a few simple questions present and based on your inputs, the tool generates a score.

How can I improve my score?

You can improve the score by focusing on key parameters, or deep diving into each of them. Based on your inputs, the tool will share key insights with you in terms of areas of improvement.

What does the coach feature do?

The coach feature shares key inputs/insights and helps you understand how can you improve certain areas of your life.

Can I connect my fitness device?

Yes you can connect any fitness band or device. In case you're unable to connect, then you can also enter key data manually.

Is there any trial on offer?

No we do not have any trial of the One Health Score. You will need to become a member before trying the score.

What happens if I stop entering information?

If you're inactive, then automatically the score would start dipping. The One Health Score requires engagement from users to better help them in their health journey.

How is the score unique?

The One Health Score (OHS) is a scientifically backed health score. It looks at various facets of one's health and helps them know their inside story better.

I am not an Arya member. Can I still try the score?

No, you will need to become an Arya member to try the score.

Where can I find One Health Score?

You can find the One Health Score if you're a member, within a banner inside the NH Care App.

Do I need to install any separate app for One Health Score?

No you do not need to install any other app to try the One Health Score.

HEALTH.

Brief Profile

Dr. Neelima S is a skilled ENT surgeon with 5 years of experience in diagnosing and treating a wide range of ear, nose, and throat conditions. She holds an MBBS degree along with a Diploma in Otorhinolaryngology (DLO) and a DNB in ENT, giving her a solid foundation in medical practice.

 

Her expertise spans various surgical procedures, including Adenotonsillectomy, Septoplasty, Functional Endoscopic Sinus Surgery (FESS), and Micro-laryngeal surgeries. Known for her soft-spoken and patient-centred approach, Dr. Neelima takes the time to thoroughly understand her patients' concerns, ensuring that each treatment is carefully tailored to their needs.

Brief Profile

Dr. Navya is a distinguished dermatologist and cosmetologist with over 7 years of experience in the field. Holding an impressive array of qualifications, including an MBBS, MD, DNB, and FRGUHS, she brings both expertise and a deep commitment to patient care. Fluent in English, Telugu, Tamil, Hindi, and Kannada, Dr. Navya ensures effective communication with her diverse patient base, making every consultation a personalized experience.

 

Her clinical expertise spans a broad range of dermatological and cosmetic procedures, including nail and hair surgeries, mole removal, acne scar surgery, sebaceous cyst and lipoma excision, facial rejuvenation, and anti-ageing treatments. Dr. Navya's approach to treatment is both holistic and minimalist, focusing on achieving aesthetically pleasing results that enhance her patients' natural beauty while addressing the underlying causes of skin conditions.

 

Dr. Navya's academic achievements further highlight her dedication to dermatology. She was a university rank holder in her MBBS program and the top student in her MD DVL program. Her commitment to excellence is also reflected in the numerous awards she has received, including the IADVL National Scholarship and top honours in state and national quizzes. Dr. Navya firmly believes in the power of healthy skin as a reflection of overall well-being, and she strives to empower her patients to achieve their best skin health.

Brief Profile

Dr. Narendra Sagar is a skilled Radiologist with extensive expertise in both diagnostic and interventional radiology. He holds an MBBS and an MD in Radiology and is well-versed in a broad spectrum of radiological procedures. His practice includes advanced techniques such as image-guided biopsies, radiofrequency ablation, and endovenous laser therapy. Dr. Sagar is also proficient in angioplasty and stenting, vertebroplasty and kyphoplasty, as well as various drainage and embolization procedures.

 

Dr. Sagar’s comprehensive skill set extends to diagnostic imaging across multiple specialties including paediatric, neuroradiology, musculoskeletal, cardiovascular, and oncological imaging. His work in emergency radiology, breast imaging, and nuclear medicine further highlights his versatile capabilities. Known for his precise and effective diagnostic and interventional techniques, Dr. Narendra Sagar is dedicated to delivering high-quality patient care through advanced radiological practices.

Brief Profile

Dr. Manjula H M is an experienced Obstetrician and Gynaecologist with over 24 years of expertise in women’s healthcare. She holds an MBBS, MS in Obstetrics and Gynaecology, along with specialized Fellowships in Assisted Reproductive Technology (ART) and Minimal Access Surgery. Dr. Manjula is fluent in English, Hindi, Kannada, Malayalam, and Telugu, which allows her to communicate effectively with a wide range of patients.

 

Her extensive experience spans across high-risk pregnancy management, infertility treatments, and laparoscopic surgeries. She is skilled in performing both emergency and elective Caesarean deliveries, vaginal deliveries, hysterectomies, and other gynaecological procedures such as MTPs, fertility-sparing surgeries, and hysteroscopic interventions. Dr. Manjula's dedication to delivering personalized care ensures that patients receive optimal treatment outcomes, especially in complex and sensitive cases.

 

With a patient-centred approach, Dr. Manjula combines her vast expertise in gynaecological surgeries and fertility treatments to provide comprehensive care to women across all stages of life. Whether addressing infertility or managing high-risk pregnancies, her focus is on ensuring the best possible outcomes for her patients.

Brief Profile

Dr. Gayatri Gopalakrishnan is an accomplished Medical Gastroenterologist with extensive expertise in the diagnosis and management of gastrointestinal disorders. Holding an MBBS, MD in Internal Medicine, and dual DNB qualifications in General Medicine and Gastroenterology, she brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to her practice. Dr. Gayatri specializes in managing chronic conditions such as Inflammatory Bowel Diseases (IBD), including Ulcerative Colitis, Crohn’s Disease, and Microscopic Colitis. Her approach is comprehensive, incorporating medication management, nutritional assessment, lifestyle modifications, and endoscopic procedures to ensure optimal patient outcomes.

 

With advanced skills in diagnostic and interventional endoscopy, Dr. Gayatri excels in performing upper GI endoscopies, sigmoidoscopies, and colonoscopies. She is also at the forefront of immunotherapies for IBD and has a keen interest in translational research, particularly in the areas of colorectal cancer and innovative endoscopic techniques like chromoendoscopy. Her patient-centric care extends to preventive screening, expert nutritional counselling, and a commitment to providing specialized treatment plans for complex gastrointestinal conditions.

Inflammatory Bowel Diseases (IBD) including Ulcerative colitis
Crohn’s Disease
Microscopic colitis, and Enteritis

sigmoidoscopy, and colonoscopy

Brief Profile

 Dr. Farzana Mehboobunnissa is a distinguished Dermatologist and Cosmetologist with an MBBS and an MD in Dermatology. Proficient in English, Dr. Farzana specializes in a wide array of advanced cosmetic and dermatological treatments. With a focus on non-surgical anti-aging solutions, she provides expert services in Botox, fillers, threads, and comprehensive acne and scar treatments. Her expertise extends to innovative procedures such as micro-needling, laser scar resurfacing, non-surgical face tightening, and carbon peel treatments, offering personalized care for both cosmetic enhancements and skin health.

 

In addition to her proficiency in anti-aging solutions, Dr. Farzana is highly skilled in advanced laser treatments, including laser hair reduction, laser toning, and tattoo removal. She also offers HIFU and Thermage treatments for skin tightening and rejuvenation. Dr. Farzana's holistic approach combines minimally invasive techniques with cutting-edge technology, ensuring her patients receive the most effective and tailored solutions for their aesthetic and dermatological needs.

Brief Profile

Dr. Ashutosh Vashistha is a distinguished Cardiologist with an impressive 34-year career spanning multiple cities across India. His extensive qualifications include MBBS, a Diploma in Cardiology, and fellowships with prestigious organizations such as the Royal College of Physicians (FRCP), the American College of Cardiology (FACC), and the European Society of Cardiology (FESC). Dr. Vashistha is renowned for his expertise in managing complex cardiovascular conditions, including endovascular treatments for aortic diseases, carotid interventions, and percutaneous aortic valve implantation.

 

Dr. Vashistha's specialty interests include cardiovascular care, non-invasive cardiology testing, and pacemaker implantation. His career is marked by a commitment to accurate diagnosis and empathetic patient care, reflected in his active involvement with professional societies like the Cardiological Society of India (CSI) and the Indian Medical Association (IMA). In addition to his clinical practice, Dr. Vashistha has contributed to the field through research, workshops, and numerous published papers, showcasing his dedication to advancing cardiology.

Brief Profile

Dr. Anuradha Kannan is an accomplished Obstetrician and Gynaecologist with extensive qualifications, including an MBBS, MD, DNB, and FNB in Reproductive Medicine. With her vast expertise, she provides comprehensive care for women across all stages of life, from pregnancy to reproductive health challenges. Dr. Kannan’s proficiency in English enables her to effectively communicate with a diverse patient base.

 

In addition to her work in obstetrics and gynaecology, Dr. Kannan is also skilled in managing chronic conditions such as diabetes, hypertension, and thyroid disorders, blending her expertise in general medicine with her focus on women’s health. Her holistic approach ensures that her patients receive personalized and compassionate care, aimed at promoting overall wellness.

 

Dr. Kannan’s dedication to staying updated with the latest advancements in reproductive medicine and gynaecology has made her a trusted figure in her field. Whether it’s guiding patients through complex pregnancies or providing solutions for infertility, Dr. Kannan’s patient-centred care stands out for its precision and empathy.

Brief Profile

Dr. Amrita Himalayani is a highly experienced Obstetrician and Gynaecologist with over 14 years of expertise in women's health. She holds an MBBS, MD, and DNB in Obstetrics & Gynaecology, and has consistently demonstrated excellence throughout her medical career, having been recognized as the "Best Outgoing Student" during her MBBS program. Fluent in both English and Hindi, Dr. Amrita ensures clear and compassionate communication with her patients, offering personalized care that meets their unique needs.

 

Her areas of expertise span prenatal care, labour and delivery management, infertility treatment, and routine gynaecological exams. Dr. Amrita also specializes in minimally invasive gynaecological surgeries and laparoscopic procedures, ensuring safe and effective treatment options. She strongly believes in "empathy, compassion, trust, and patient-centred care," principles that guide her practice and enable her to build lasting relationships with her patients, empowering them to make informed decisions about their health.

 

Dr. Amrita’s holistic approach to women’s healthcare covers the full spectrum of life stages, from puberty to menopause, ensuring comprehensive care that addresses every aspect of her patients' well-being.

Narayana Clinic, HSR

Brief Profile

Dr. Amarnath Reddy is a highly experienced Orthopaedic and Joint Replacement Surgeon with over 18 years of expertise in treating a wide range of musculoskeletal conditions. Holding an MBBS and an MS in Orthopaedics, Dr. Reddy specializes in joint replacement surgeries, including total hip and knee replacements, as well as advanced arthroscopic procedures. His skills in diagnostic and therapeutic arthroscopy extend to various joints, including the knee, shoulder, hip, and ankle, ensuring minimally invasive solutions for patients with joint issues. In addition to joint replacements and arthroscopy, Dr. Reddy is proficient in orthopaedic trauma, sports medicine, and spine surgery, offering comprehensive care for injuries and degenerative conditions. His patient-centred approach focuses on restoring mobility and improving the quality of life for his patients, making him a trusted name in orthopaedic care. Dr. Reddy’s commitment to excellence and his vast clinical experience have earned him a reputation as a leading specialist in orthopaedics and joint replacement surgery. Fluent in English, he ensures clear communication and personalized treatment plans, delivering optimal outcomes for his patients.

Areas of Interest
Joint Replacement Surgery
Orthopedic Trauma
Sports Medicine
Spine Surgery
Arthroscopy

Brief Profile

Dr. Khazim Mohamood is a highly experienced Orthopaedics and Joint Replacement Surgeon with an MBBS, MS in Orthopaedics, and DNB in Orthopaedic Surgery. Fluent in English, he offers expertise in a range of orthopaedic procedures, including diagnostic arthroscopy, total hip and knee replacement, carpal tunnel release, and shoulder replacement surgery. Dr. Khazim is also proficient in complex procedures like laminectomy, various arthroscopic surgeries (hip, ankle, knee, and shoulder), and specialized surgeries such as meniscus repair and PCL reconstruction.

 

With a focus on joint replacement surgery, orthopaedic trauma, sports medicine, spine surgery, and arthroscopy, Dr. Khazim provides comprehensive care for patients with musculoskeletal issues. His dedication to using the latest advancements in orthopaedic treatment ensures patients receive personalized, high-quality care aimed at improving mobility, reducing pain, and enhancing overall quality of life.

Brief Profile

Dr. Ramesh Patil is a highly experienced Neurologist with 17 years of expertise. With an MBBS, MD in General Medicine, and DM in Neurology, Dr. Patil is renowned for his comprehensive approach to diagnosing and treating complex neurological conditions. His areas of specialty include Stroke and Cerebrovascular Disorders, Epilepsy and Seizure Disorders, Neurodegenerative Diseases, and Headaches and Migraines.

 

Dr. Patil's professional journey has seen him address numerous challenging cases across various cities in India. He is particularly noted for his precision in diagnosis and his empathetic patient care. His interests extend to Movement Disorders, Multiple Sclerosis, Dementia and Cognitive Disorders, and Peripheral Neuropathy, among others. As an active member of the Indian Academy of Neurology, Dr. Patil also contributes to the field through research and participation in workshops, underscoring his commitment to advancing neurological care.

Brief Profile

Dr. Sapna Raina is a highly experienced Obstetrician and Gynaecologist with over 22 years of expertise in women's health. She completed her MBBS and MD in Obstetrics & Gynaecology from the prestigious Government Medical College, Jammu. Dr. Sapna specializes in comprehensive care for women, with a focus on pregnancy, childbirth, and gynaecological health, ensuring the best outcomes for both routine and high-risk cases.

 

A dedicated professional, Dr. Sapna is a member of the Karnataka Medical Council and is known for her patient-centred approach, ensuring women receive compassionate, quality care. Her vast experience and clinical skills make her a trusted expert in managing various obstetric and gynaecological conditions.

Brief Profile

Dr. Harini Sreedharan is a distinguished Paediatrician and Neonatologist with extensive qualifications, including an MBBS, MS in Paediatrics, DNB in Paediatrics, and a Fellowship in Neonatology. With expertise in managing critically ill and pre-term babies, she excels in procedures such as neonatal resuscitation, endotracheal intubation, exchange transfusion, and lumbar puncture. Dr. Harini is deeply committed to ensuring optimal care for neonates, with specialized skills in treating pulmonary hypertension, cooling therapy for birth asphyxia, and ECMO, having been part of the team that performed the first Neonatal ECMO in Karnataka.

 

In addition to her clinical acumen, Dr. Harini is dedicated to child nutrition, growth, and immunization guidance. She has handled numerous complex paediatric cases and is known for her meticulous attention to detail, accurate diagnosis, and empathetic approach to patient care. With several national publications to her name, she is a trusted expert in the field, committed to improving the health and well-being of children and newborns.

Areas of Interest
Infectious diseases in children
Behavioural disorders in children

Brief Profile

Dr. Preethi Patil is a seasoned psychiatrist with extensive experience in addressing a wide range of psychiatric conditions affecting both adults and children. She completed her MBBS in 2000 and furthered her psychiatric training in the United Kingdom from 2002 to 2007, obtaining her MRCPsych. Her expertise spans mood disorders, anxiety disorders, psychotic disorders, and addiction psychiatry, reflecting her comprehensive approach to mental health.

 

Dr. Patil’s primary focus areas include mood disorders, psychotic disorders, and substance use disorders. She is well-versed in managing complex cases involving mood fluctuations, anxiety, and addiction, providing holistic care tailored to everyone's needs. Her proficiency in these areas is complemented by her ability to address a broad spectrum of psychiatric conditions, including developmental, behavioural, and neurocognitive disorders.

 

Fluent in English, Dr. Patil is known for her empathetic approach and dedication to improving her patients' mental well-being. Her commitment to providing high-quality psychiatric care is evident in her comprehensive treatment plans and her focus on supporting both emotional and psychological health.

Brief Profile

Dr. Subramanian Kannan is a distinguished endocrinologist with over 12 years of experience, specializing in diabetes management, diabetic foot care, and metabolic disorders. His extensive expertise, combined with his fluency in English, Hindi, Kannada, and Tamil, allows him to connect effectively with a broad range of patients across Narayana Clinics in Bangalore. Dr. Kannan's qualifications, including an MBBS, MD, and dual board certifications in Internal Medicine & Endocrinology, further highlight his commitment to delivering exceptional care.

 

Dr. Kannan’s approach is rooted in preventive care, ensuring early intervention for conditions like diabetes, thyroid disorders, and metabolic imbalances. He offers personalized treatment plans for Type-1 diabetes, insulin pump therapy, and continuous glucose monitoring, along with specialized care for pregnancy-related diabetes and bone and mineral disorders. Dr. Kannan’s dedication to his patients, combined with his academic achievements, underscores his role as a leading expert in the field of endocrinology.

Areas of Interest
Diabetes including Type-1 Diabetes
Insulin Pump
Continuous Glucose Monitoring
Pregnancy Diabetes; Thyroid Nodules
Thyroid Cancer; Endocrine Hypertension
Parathyroid and Bone & Mineral Disorders
Osteoporosis
Growth & Puberty

Brief Profile

Dr Ashutosh Vashistha is a well-known Cardiologist currently associated with Narayana Institute of Cardiac Sciences, Bommasandra. He has 34 years of experience in Cardiology and worked as an expert Cardiologist in different cities of India.

 

 Doctor Ashutosh Vashistha has contributed to handling numerous complex medical cases in several hospitals. He is known for his attention to accurate diagnosis and for treating patients empathetically. The speciality interests of Dr Ashutosh are Cardiovascular care, Non-Invasive Cardiology Testing, and Pacemaker Implantation. He is also an active member of the Cardiological Society of India (CSI), the Indian Medical Association (IMA), etc.

 

Dr Ashutosh Vashistha did his graduation with MBBS in 1990 and Diploma In Cardiology in 1992 from Kanpur University. He also completed his fellowship from the Royal College of Physicians. He has also participated in research work and various workshops under the Cardiology department and published many papers.

 

Check the contact details and consultation fee of Dr Ashutosh for priority appointments and a hassle-free experience at HexaHealth.

Areas of Interest
Poly trauma
Pelvi acetabulum surgeries
ilizarov external fixators
limb lengthening and deformity corrections

Brief Profile

Dr. Chethan B Bhandary is a highly respected Internal Medicine Specialist with over 46 years of experience. Dr. Bhandary completed his MBBS in 1978 and later earned a Post Graduate Diploma in Medical & Ethics in 2001. He is a distinguished member of the Indian Association of General Practitioners

 

Dr. Bhandary's extensive expertise encompasses the management of chronic conditions such as hypertension, diabetes, hyperlipidaemia, and thyroid disorders. His proficiency also includes treating complex cases related to COPD, asthma, heart disease, gastrointestinal disorders, and kidney disease. Known for his thorough approach and compassionate care, Dr. Bhandary is dedicated to improving patient health through evidence-based practices and personalised treatment plans.

Areas of Interest
General Medicine
Pulmonology
Chronic Metabolic Diseases (Such as Diabetes, Hypertension, Thyroid Disorders, and Infections)

Services
Consultation
Pediatrics
PEDIATRICS
Overview

Pediatrics is a specialized field of medicine focused on the health and well-being of children from infancy through adolescence. Pediatricians provide essential care at each stage of development, addressing both common and complex health issues unique to children.

The pediatric team at Narayana One Health is dedicated to ensuring that your children grow up healthy and resilient, offering a wide range of pediatric services and support to both patients and their families. Our pediatricians aim to provide preventive care, manage acute and chronic illnesses, and support families for a holistic approach to children’s health.

Book Appointment
Pediatricians at Narayana One Health excel in
Dengue Fever and Flu Treatment

Expert care for managing dengue fever and flu, ensuring quick recovery and symptom relief.

Vaccination for Children

Stay on track with immunization schedules, safeguarding your child’s health against preventable diseases

Pediatric/Bronchial Asthma Management

Specialized treatment to control asthma symptoms, improve breathing, and enhance quality of life quality of life.

Infections

Prompt diagnosis and effective treatment for bacterial, viral, and fungal infections in children.

Growth and Development Assessment

Regular monitoring to track your child’s physical, emotional, and cognitive milestones.

Newborn Check-Up and Vaccinations

Comprehensive health evaluations and timely vaccinations to give your baby a healthy start.

Treatments we offer
Management of Acute Illnesses
Routine Pediatric Care
Management of Chronic Conditions
Pediatric Nutrition
Developmental and Behavioral Pediatrics
Patient and Family Education
Management of Acute Illnesses
About Management of Acute Illnesses

Children often experience acute illnesses, ranging from common infections to respiratory and gastrointestinal issues. Our pediatricians provide prompt care to help children recover quickly and comfortably.

Common Infections

Treatment for colds, flu, and ear infections to minimize discomfort and prevent complications.

Gastroenteritis

Support for children experiencing gastrointestinal symptoms, ensuring rehydration and relief from symptoms.

Respiratory Issues

Specialized care for asthma, wheezing, and other respiratory concerns, helping children breathe easier and stay active.

Pediatric Treatment Process
01
Initial Consultation

Listening to parents’ concerns and understanding the child’s health history.

02
Physical Examination

Conducting a thorough exam to assess the child’s health and symptoms.

03
Diagnosis

Identifying any health issues and planning an effective course of action.

04
Additional Testing if Required

Recommending diagnostic tests when necessary for a precise diagnosis.

05
Treatment Plan Development:

Creating a tailored treatment plan or referring to a specialist if needed.

06
Follow-Up Care and Guidance

Providing follow-up visits, guidance, and counseling to support the child’s ongoing health.

When to Consult a Pediatrician

Parents should consider consulting a pediatrician at Narayana One Health if their child exhibits any of the following symptoms or concerns

 

Fever, persistent cough, cold, sore throat
Digestive issues, pain in abdomen, loss of appetite or unexplained weight loss or gain
Skin Rashes or Infections
Developmental or Behavioral Concerns - Delayed milestones (e.g., walking, talking), difficulty with social interactions or eye contact, challenges in motor skills, coordination, or posture, etc.
Chronic Conditions such as asthma or allergies
Unusual fatigue or sleep issues
Dietary or nutritional concerns

Lab Test And...
LAB TEST AND DIAGNOSTICS
Introduction

At Narayana One Health, our Diagnostics Services provide patients with the clarity and confidence they need to manage their health proactively. Our offerings cover a comprehensive range of tests and screenings, including standard blood work, advanced cardiac assessments, and imaging services, all processed through our NABL-certified laboratory.

Equipped with the latest technology, our diagnostic services ensure high accuracy, reliability, and patient-centered care. Whether you’re looking for preventive check-ups, specialized screenings, or routine health assessments, we’re here to deliver timely and precise results.

NABL-Certified Central Diagnostic Lab
What it is

Our central diagnostic laboratory is NABL-certified, ensuring it meets stringent standards for quality, accuracy, and reliability in all test results.

Who should get it done

Anyone who values precise, high-quality test results, especially those requiring specialized or complex diagnostic tests.

Why it’s important

NABL certification is an assurance of quality control, accurate diagnostics, and adherence to international standards, which is vital for reliable health insights.

Blood Sample Collection / Labs
Imagging and Radiology
Cardiac Diagnostics
Other diagnostics
Blood Sample Collection / Labs
About Sample Collection

Blood sample collection is a fundamental diagnostic procedure involving a small blood draw, which is then tested for various biomarkers such as cholesterol, blood glucose, vitamin levels, and white/red blood cell counts.

Who Should Get It Done

Ideal for anyone undergoing routine health check-ups, patients managing chronic conditions, or individuals experiencing symptoms such as fatigue, infections, or unexplained weight changes.

Why It’s Important

Blood testing is critical for assessing general health and detecting potential issues like diabetes, anemia, infections, and organ function disorders, providing a baseline for treatment or lifestyle changes.

List of Blood Test available at Narayana One Health:
Complete Blood Count (CBC)

Measures various blood components, including red and white blood cells, hemoglobin, hematocrit, and platelets to detect conditions like anemia, infections, inflammation, bleeding disorders, or immune system diseases.

Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate (ESR)

Measures the rate at which red blood cells settle at the bottom of a test tube to detect inflammation in the body, which may indicate infections, autoimmune diseases, or cancers.

HbA1c (Glycated Hemoglobin)

Measures average blood glucose levels over the past 2-3 months to diagnose and monitor diabetes or prediabetes.

Fasting Blood Sugar (FBS)

Measures blood sugar levels after an overnight fast to detect diabetes or prediabetes.

Postprandial Blood Sugar (PPBS)

Measures blood sugar levels 2 hours after eating to evaluate blood sugar management after meals and diagnose diabetes.

Creatinine

Measures the level of creatinine, a waste product from muscles, in the blood to assess kidney function, as high levels can indicate kidney impairment.

Serum Urea & Blood Urea Nitrogen (BUN)

Measures urea nitrogen levels in the blood to evaluate kidney function, as elevated levels may indicate kidney disease or dehydration.

Uric Acid - Serum

Pleasures uric acid levels in the blood to diagnose gout and monitor uric acid in patients at risk for kidney disease or with kidney stones.

Calcium & Phosphorus (Inorganic) - Serum

Measures calcium and phosphorus levels in the blood to assess bone health, parathyroid function, and kidney function.

Total Cholesterol

Measures overall cholesterol in the blood to assess heart disease risk, as high levels may increase the risk of cardiovascular conditions.

LDL (Low-Density Lipoprotein) Cholesterol

Known as "bad" cholesterol; high levels can lead to plaque buildup in arteries To assess heart disease risk.

HDL (High-Density Lipoprotein) Cholesterol

Known as "good" cholesterol, which helps clear other cholesterol from the bloodstream, and higher HDL levels reduce heart disease risk.

VLDL (Very Low-Density Lipoprotein)

Transports triglycerides in the blood, with high levels potentially contributing to plaque buildup in arteries.

Triglycerides

Measures triglyceride levels, a type of fat in the blood, with high levels increasing heart disease risk, particularly when paired with high cholesterol.

Bilirubin

Measures bilirubin levels, a waste product from red blood cell breakdown, with high levels suggesting liver disease or bile duct blockage.

ALT/SGPT (Alanine Aminotransferase)

An enzyme in the liver; high levels may signal liver damage, helping to detect liver conditions.

AST/SGOT (Aspartate Aminotransferase)

An enzyme in the liver and muscles, with high levels indicating liver infection or heart damage, aiding in the detection of liver and heart conditions.

Serum Protein, Albumin, and Globulin (A/G Ratio)

Measures total protein levels, including albumin and globulin, to assess liver function, nutritional status, and immune health.

Thyroid Profile (T3, T4, TSH)

Measures thyroid hormones (T3, T4) and thyroid-stimulating hormone (TSH) levels to evaluate thyroid function, as abnormal levels may indicate hypothyroidism or hyperthyroidism.

Prostate-Specific Antigen (PSA)

Measures PSA levels, which may indicate prostate conditions in men, as elevated levels may signal prostate cancer or other prostate-related issues.

CA125

Measures the CA125 protein level, which may be elevated in ovarian cancer, used to monitor or diagnose ovarian cancer.

Who Should Consider Diagnostics?

Diagnostics are beneficial for anyone prioritizing preventive health and proactive management of existing health conditions. Consider scheduling diagnostic tests if you:

Have a family history of specific conditions like cardiovascular disease or diabetes.
Experience symptoms that require further investigation (e.g., chest pain, dizziness).
Are managing chronic health conditions needing regular monitoring. 
Are pregnant or planning for pregnancy. 
If you want a preventive check-up to detect potential health issues early.
Book Appointment
Frequently Asked Questions
What should I bring for my diagnostic appointment?
Please bring your prescriptions and any previous test results. We will provide specific preparation instructions if a test requires fasting or other measures.
How should I prepare for my diagnostic test?
Some tests require fasting, while others may need you to avoid certain medications. Our team will give you test-specific instructions during booking.
When will I receive my test results?
Most test results are available within 24-48 hours, with expedited options available. Specialized tests may require slightly more processing time.

About
 
The
 
Clinic
 

Step into Narayana Clinic, Haralur, where your health and well-being are paramount. Here, we go beyond mere healthcare; we offer a holistic experience tailored to your unique needs. Led by esteemed physicians and supported by a dedicated team, we provide a spectrum of services ranging from preventive care to specialised treatments and diagnostics.

What distinguishes Narayana Clinic, Haralur is our unwavering commitment to integrated care. Our advanced facilities and cutting-edge technologies ensure that you receive nothing short of excellence in a comforting ambiance. Understanding that each individual is different, we prioritise listening, educating, and collaborating with you to devise personalised treatment plans that resonate with your lifestyle and preferences. Embark on a journey to wellness with Narayana Clinic, Haralur. Let us be your trusted partner in health and vitality.

How do I schedule an appointment?

You can schedule appointments through various convenient channels: 

The NH Care app 
Call our call centre number 7026222222 
Visit our website
  
Do you accept insurance, and which providers do you work with?

We accept insurance for selected services such as chemotherapy and dialysis. For more details, please contact us directly.

Can I request a specific doctor?

Yes, you can request a specific doctor who is available at our clinic. 

What are your clinic's operating hours?

Our operating hours are as follows: 

E-City Clinic: 7 AM to 9 PM 
HSR Clinic: 7 AM to 9 PM 
Other Clinics: 8 AM to 8 PM 
How do I obtain my medical records?

You can obtain your medical records through the NH Care app.

Brief Profile

Reshma Renjith is a skilled Clinical Nutritionist with over five years of experience in the field. Holding an MSc in Dietetics, she combines her extensive knowledge with a compassionate approach to help individuals achieve their best health through personalized dietary strategies. Fluent in English, Tamil, and Malayalam, Reshma excels in crafting tailored meal plans and providing nutritional counselling that caters to a diverse range of needs.

 

Her expertise spans critical care, renal, diabetic, cardiac, and oncology nutrition, ensuring that she can address complex dietary requirements with precision. Reshma is dedicated to not only providing evidence-based nutritional therapy but also to fostering a supportive and empathetic environment for her patients. Her commitment to clear communication and adaptability makes her an invaluable resource for those seeking to enhance their well-being through thoughtful and informed dietary choices.

Areas of Interest
Critical Care Nutrition
Renal Nutrition, Diabetes Management
Cardiac and Oncology Nutrition

Brief Profile

Dr. Vineetha J Malayil is a skilled ENT specialist with extensive experience in diagnosing and treating a wide range of ear, nose, and throat conditions. She holds an MBBS and MS in ENT and is proficient in both medical and surgical interventions. Dr. Vineetha specializes in ear surgeries such as tympanoplasty, nasal polypectomy, tonsillectomy, septoplasty, and sinus surgeries. Her expertise extends to advanced procedures like laryngoscopy , adenotonsillectomy, Excision of head and neck swellings, Ear Lobe repair, Management of vertigo.

 

With a strong focus on patient care, Dr. Vineetha is known for her ability to manage complex ENT cases, including ear drum repair, sinus issues, and throat conditions like tonsillitis. Her commitment to providing precise, evidence-based treatment has earned her a reputation for excellence in ENT care. Fluent in English, she ensures her patients are well-informed and comfortable throughout their treatment journey.

Brief Profile

Dr. Sumedha Gandotra is a highly experienced Paediatrician with 18 years of expertise in providing exceptional care for infants, children, and adolescents. She completed her MBBS from Government Medical College, Jammu, in 2005, followed by a DNB in Paediatrics from St. Philomena’s Hospital, Bangalore, in 2014. Dr. Gandotra is known for her compassionate approach and dedication to child health, focusing on critical care, neonatal resuscitation, and the management of pre-term and critically ill babies.

 

Her areas of expertise include procedures such as endotracheal intubation, exchange transfusion, and lumbar puncture. In addition, Dr. Gandotra offers guidance on child nutrition, paediatric rehabilitation, and parent counselling. She also specializes in managing infectious diseases and behavioural disorders in children, ensuring a holistic approach to paediatric care. As a member of the Karnataka Medical Council, she remains committed to continuously improving her practice and staying updated with the latest advancements in child healthcare.

Brief Profile

Dr. Kavya J is a dedicated and compassionate physician with expertise in Internal Medicine, specializing in diabetes management, preventive care, and infectious diseases. She holds an MBBS from KIMS Bangalore and completed her DNB in Family Medicine from Fortis Hospital, Bannerghatta. Dr. Kavya is committed to evidence-based, holistic care, believing in the principle that "prevention is better than cure." Her approach focuses on empowering her patients to make positive health decisions while ensuring thorough and personalized treatment.

 

With a strong background in managing conditions such as hypertension, thyroid disorders, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), and heart disease, Dr. Kavya brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to her practice. She is known for her attentive and empathetic nature, making her patients feel heard and well cared for. In addition to chronic metabolic diseases, she also provides care for geriatric patients and those with gastrointestinal, respiratory, and kidney-related illnesses.

Areas of Interest
General Medicine
Pulmonology
Chronic Metabolic Diseases (Such as Diabetes, Hypertension, Thyroid Disorders, and Infections)

The waiting area was clean and comfortable, and I didn't have to wait long before being called in for my appointment. The clinic itself was well-equipped with modern facilities and technology, which gave me confidence in the quality of care I was receiving. Overall, my experience at Narayana Health Clinic Manipal County Road was excellent, and I would highly recommend it to anyone in need of medical attention. Frequently Asked Questions
How do I schedule an appointment?

You can schedule appointments through various convenient channels: 

The NH Care app 
Call our call centre number 7026222222 
Visit our website
  
Do you accept insurance, and which providers do you work with?

We accept insurance for selected services such as chemotherapy and dialysis. For more details, please contact us directly.

Can I request a specific doctor?

Yes, you can request a specific doctor who is available at our clinic. 

What are your clinic's operating hours?

Our operating hours are as follows: 

E-City Clinic: 7 AM to 9 PM 
HSR Clinic: 7 AM to 9 PM 
Other Clinics: 8 AM to 8 PM 
How do I obtain my medical records?

You can obtain your medical records through the NH Care app.

Frequently Asked Questions
Do I need a prescription to purchase medicines from your pharmacy?
Generally, prescription medicines require a valid prescription from a licensed healthcare provider. However, certain over-the-counter (OTC) medicines and products may be available without a prescription. Consult our pharmacists for guidance.
What payment methods do you accept?
We accept cash, credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), UPI, and One Health Points for your convenience.
What should I do if I have questions about my medication or health concerns?
Our experienced pharmacists are here to help! Feel free to reach out to our pharmacy staff for any queries or health concerns you have. We're committed to providing personalised care and support tailored to your health needs. One Health Members can also connect with the assigned Care Coordinators or Chat with Care Managers on the App.
Do you offer medicine delivery?
Yes, we offer medicine delivery options for your convenience. Contact your local pharmacy to check availability and scheduling, or simply place your order via WhatsApp. One Health Members get free delivery of medicines.
Could you provide information about potential drug interactions?
Our pharmacists undergo rigorous training to identify and counsel patients on potential drug interactions. To ensure your safety and well-being, kindly inform us about all the medicines, supplements, and over-the-counter products you are using.
Can we return the medicines we’ve purchased?
Yes, we accept return within 24hours of dispensing. Please note, temperature-controlled medicines, damaged, and opened strips will not be accepted for return.

About
 
The
 
Clinic
 

Welcome to Narayana Clinic-Electronic City, nestled in the heart of Electronic City since 2012. This four-floor Super Specialty Clinic is committed to delivering comprehensive medical care to individuals and families in our community.Narayana Clinic, Electronic City stands out as a unique hub for integrated care, offering specialist consultations, lab and diagnostics, 24/7 Pharmacy, Dialysis services, Diabetic Foot Care, Asethetics, Mom and Child Services and much more. These services seamlessly cater to all your healthcare needs.

At Narayana Clinic, Electronic City, we recognize the unique needs of each patient. That's why we take the time to listen, educate, and collaborate with you to develop personalised treatment plans tailored to your specific requirements.Our state-of-the-art facilities and advanced medical technologies ensure that you receive the highest standard of care in a comfortable and welcoming environment. Whether you're seeking routine care or facing a health challenge, trust Narayana Clinic to be your partner in health and well-being. Your journey to better health starts here.

Brief Profile

Dr. Gowtham N is a dedicated Family/Internal Medicine specialist with three years of experience. He completed his MBBS and MD in General Medicine from Kazakh National Medical University in Almaty, Kazakhstan.

 

Dr. Gowtham offers expert care in managing a wide range of health conditions. His areas of expertise include hypertension, diabetes, hyperlipidaemia, and thyroid disorders, as well as chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) and asthma. Dr. Gowtham is also skilled in treating heart diseases, gastrointestinal disorders, kidney diseases, and infectious diseases. With a patient-centred approach, he focuses on delivering comprehensive and compassionate care to address both acute and chronic medical issues.

Areas of Interest
General Medicine
Pulmonology
Chronic Metabolic Diseases (Such as Diabetes, Hypertension, Thyroid Disorders, and Infections)

Brief Profile

Dr. Vinay Kumar B R specializes in Liver and Hepatobiliary Surgery. He holds an MBBS, MD in General Medicine, and a DM in Hepatology, bringing a wealth of expertise to his practice. Dr. Kumar is proficient in managing complex cases, including life-threatening bleeds and refractory ascites ICU care. His skill set extends to performing endoscopies, ERCP procedures, and liver biopsies, including transjugular liver biopsies, ensuring comprehensive care for his patients.

 

Practicing at Narayana Clinic in Electronic City and Sarjapur, Dr. Kumar offers advanced treatments such as laser piles surgery, sclerotherapy for varicose veins, various hernia surgeries, and open cholecystectomy for gallstones. His achievements include presenting research at the American Association for the Study of Liver Diseases (AASLD) and receiving the ICMR Young Student Scholarship. Certified in Trauma and Life Support (ITLS), Dr. Kumar’s dedication to patient care and medical excellence is evident in his extensive and distinguished career.

Areas of Interest
Management of Difficult Cases of Life-threatening Bleed and Refractory Ascites ICU Care
Endoscopies; ERCP Procedures
Liver Biopsy, including Transjugular Liver Biopsies

Brief Profile

Dr. Mahesh Meda is an experienced ENT specialist. He holds an MBBS, DLO, and DNB in ENT, and has developed proficiency in a wide range of advanced ENT procedures, including Coblation adenotonsillectomy, sleep apnea surgeries, balloon sinuplasty, and endoscopic sinus surgeries. Dr. Meda is also skilled in complex surgeries such as thyroid surgeries, neck dissections, and tracheal reconstruction.

 

A recognized leader in his field, Dr. Meda is an active member of several prestigious organizations, including the Association of Otolaryngology of India, the Indian Society of Otology, the Cochlear Implant Group of India, and the Indian Association of Sleep Surgeons. His commitment to patient care and his extensive surgical expertise make him a trusted specialist in managing both routine and complex ENT conditions.

Brief Profile

Dr. Rakesh Bilagi is a highly skilled pulmonologist. He holds an MBBS and an MD in Respiratory Medicine and is proficient in diagnosing and treating a wide range of lung and respiratory conditions. Dr. Bilagi is fluent in English, Hindi, Marathi, and Kannada, making him accessible to a diverse group of patients.

 

Dr. Bilagi specializes in treating both lower and upper respiratory tract infections, tuberculosis, and bronchial asthma. He also conducts Pulmonary Function Tests (PFT) to assess lung function. His expertise extends to managing complex lung disorders such as COPD, ILD, and lung malignancies, as well as providing interventional pulmonology services including bronchoscopy and thoracoscopy. Dr. Bilagi is also experienced in sleep medicine and offers comprehensive care for sleep disorders.

 

Dedicated to advancing patient care, Dr. Bilagi is an active member of the Indian Medical Association (IMA) and the Karnataka Medical Council. He is committed to providing personalized and effective treatment plans that address the unique needs of each patient.

Areas of Interest
Lung Disorders (COPD , ILD, Asthma, Occupational Lung Diseases Lung Malignancies and Pleural Diseases, Tuberculosis, Pneumonia, COVID 19, Pulmonary complications of Collagen vascular Diseases and Connective Tissue Disorders)
Interventional Pulmonology (Bronchoscopy, Thoracoscopy, ICD insertion, PCNL, Catheter Insertion, Thoracocentesis)
Sleep Medicine (OSA, OHS, Sleep Disorders Diagnosis and Treatment, Polysomnography and Titration Study)
Allergy and Immunotherapy (Allergy Diagnosis, Skin Prick Test, Immunotherapy)

Brief Profile

Dr. Rajesh S is an experienced Vascular and Endovascular Surgeon, practicing at Narayana Clinic, Haralur, on the 2nd Friday of every month from 04:30 PM to 06:00 PM. He holds an MBBS, MS, and MRCS, along with a Fellowship in Endovascular Surgery (FEVS). Fluent in English, Hindi, and Kannada, Dr. Rajesh specializes in complex vascular procedures, including Coronary Angiograms, Coronary Angioplasties (PTCA), and Pacemaker Implantations.

 

With a focus on advanced vascular treatments, Dr. Rajesh is proficient in managing cases like superior vena cava syndrome, pseudoaneurysms, and various bypass surgeries. His expertise extends to specialized procedures such as femoral and distal bypasses, hybrid techniques, and multimodality management of AV access failures. He also has significant experience in torso trauma repairs and the insertion of portacaths and Hickman catheters for chemotherapy patients.

 

Dr. Rajesh is a member of several prestigious medical societies, including the Royal College of Surgeons (UK), the Bangalore Surgical Society, and the Vascular Society of India, among others.

Superior vena cava syndrome
Reconstruction with spiral graft
Pseudoaneurysms

Axillo-bifem Aortobifem & Hybrid procedures
Redo bypass surgery
Multimodality management of AV- Access & multiple access failures
Specialised in Reversed Vein bypass, mintouch technique, fem distal bypass
Torso-trauma: arterial & venous injury repairs
Av-fistulas, AV-grafts arm Forearm, basilic transposition
Portacath & Hickman catheter insertions in cancer patients for chemotherapy

Brief Profile

Dr. Vijay Pillai is a highly skilled Head and Neck Surgeon, as well as an Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeon, with a focus on Head and Neck Oncology. He brings an impressive array of qualifications, including an MBBS, BDS, MDS in Maxillofacial Surgery, and a Fellowship in Head and Neck Surgical Oncology from RGUHS. Additionally, Dr. Pillai holds memberships with esteemed organizations such as the Foundation of Head and Neck Oncology and the Association of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeons of India, further establishing his credibility in his field.

 

With a special interest in microvascular surgery, Dr. Pillai's expertise spans the treatment of complex diseases affecting the oral cavity, sinonasal complex, thyroid, larynx, and hypopharynx. He is also proficient in head and neck reconstruction surgeries, making him a leading expert in both oncological and reconstructive care. Dr. Pillai consults at Narayana Clinic, Electronic City on Mondays and at Narayana Clinic, Sarjapur on Fridays, offering compassionate care in multiple languages, including English, Hindi, Malayalam, Tamil, and Kannada.

Dr. Kushalappa specializes in the comprehensive management of shoulder and elbow joint injuries, including fractures, soft tissue injuries, and arthritis. Brief Profile

Dr. Sathya Vamsi Krishna is a highly skilled Orthopaedics and Joint Replacement Surgeon with over 14 years of experience. He holds an MBBS, MS in Orthopaedics, and has completed multiple fellowships, including Dr. Paul Brand Fellowship in Hand and Reconstructive Microsurgery, Fellowship in Hand and Microsurgery, and Fellowship in Hand and Upper Extremity Surgery. Dr. Krishna specializes in treating various hand and upper limb extremity conditions, including hand, wrist, and elbow injuries, brachial plexus and peripheral nerve injuries, spasticity management, and congenital hand disorders.

 

Dr. Krishna has earned several accolades, including the Gold Medal for Best Outgoing Student in MS Orthopaedics from RGUHS, and the Second Best Paper Award at KOACON 2020 for his work on multidirectional instability of the elbow. He has also been nominated for prestigious awards such as the Kamat Best Poster Award at APSICON 2021 and the Best Paper Award at ISSHCON 2023. Additionally, he received the ASSH International Travelling Fellowship Award in 2023. Dr. Krishna practices at Narayana Clinic, HSR Layout, where he is available for consultations on Mondays and Fridays from 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM.

Areas of Interest
Hand, Wrist, and Elbow Injuries and Disorders
Brachial Plexus and Peripheral Nerve Injuries
Spasticity Management
Congenital Hand Disorders

Brief Profile

Dr. Sumana C V is a skilled ENT surgeon based at Narayana Health City, bringing a wealth of experience and expertise to her practice. She completed her MBBS and pursued a Post Graduate Diploma in Otorhinolaryngology from JJM Medical College Davanagere and Mazumdar Shaw Medical Centre. Recognized for her exceptional academic performance, she was awarded the Best Outgoing Post Graduate Student in 2011. Dr. Sumana further advanced her skills with a Fellowship in Endoscopic Sinus and Skull Base Surgery at MCV Memorial ENT Trust Hospital, Pollachi.

 

Her practice includes a wide range of ENT procedures such as ear drum repair, tympanoplasty, nasal polypectomy, and sinus surgery. Dr. Sumana is proficient in managing conditions related to tonsillitis, laryngoscopy, and adenotonsillectomy. Her training and experience equip her to handle complex cases with precision and care, making her a trusted expert in the field of ENT surgery.

Brief Profile

Dr. Santosh K M is a seasoned physician with over 11 years of experience in Family and Internal Medicine. He specializes in managing chronic conditions such as hypertension, diabetes, hyperlipidaemia, and thyroid disorders. His expertise also extends to the treatment of respiratory conditions like chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) and asthma, as well as heart diseases, gastrointestinal disorders, and kidney conditions.

 

Known for his keen diagnostic abilities and compassionate approach, Dr. Santosh has managed numerous complex medical cases across various cities in India. His particular interests include the treatment of infectious diseases, vaccination, and immunization, where his contributions have been well-regarded. Additionally, he has been actively involved in research and has participated in several workshops, further enhancing his skills in family medicine.

 

Fluent in English and Kannada, Dr. Santosh’s commitment to patient care and his focus on delivering holistic treatment make him a trusted name in the field of family medicine.

Brief Profile

Dr. Purushotham Lal R is a highly skilled Orthopedic Surgeon with over 18 years of experience in treating a wide range of musculoskeletal conditions. He holds a Diploma in Orthopaedics from J.S.S. Medical College, Mysore, and a DNB in Orthopedics from Meenakshi Mission. His expertise spans across advanced orthopedic procedures, including total hip and knee replacements, diagnostic and therapeutic arthroscopy, and complex reconstructive surgeries like meniscus repair and PCL reconstruction. In addition to joint replacement surgeries, Dr. Purushotham specializes in trauma care, particularly poly trauma and pelvic-acetabular surgeries. His experience with limb deformity correction, limb lengthening, and the use of Ilizarov external fixators makes him an expert in handling complex orthopedic cases. He is a member of esteemed medical bodies such as the Indian Orthopaedic Association and the Orthopaedic Association of South Indian States (OASIS), showcasing his commitment to excellence in orthopedic care. Fluent in English, Hindi, and Kannada, Dr. Purushotham is known for his patient-centered approach, ensuring clear communication and personalized treatment plans. His dedication to delivering high-quality care and achieving optimal outcomes has earned him the trust of his patients across the region.

Brief Profile

Dr. Ganesh Srinivas Prasad is a distinguished Nephrologist with extensive training and experience in the field. He completed his MBBS from PES Institute of Medical Sciences and Research, followed by a DNB in General Medicine from Lisie Medical Institutions, Ernakulam. He further specialized in Nephrology through a DNB program at Narayana Health, Bangalore. Dr. Ganesh is adept at managing a wide range of kidney-related conditions, including acute and chronic kidney diseases, glomerular disorders, and electrolyte imbalances.

 

His expertise extends to complex procedures such as dialysis (both hemodialysis and peritoneal dialysis), kidney transplantation, and stone removal. Dr. Ganesh is also skilled in managing hypertension and providing immunosuppressive therapy for patients undergoing renal transplants. His approach integrates medication management, dietary modifications, and lifestyle counselling to deliver comprehensive care tailored to individual patient needs. With a strong focus on improving renal health and patient outcomes, Dr. Ganesh is committed to advancing nephrology through compassionate and expert care.

Brief Profile

Dr. Prasenjit Sutradhar is a skilled Thoracic and Vascular Surgeon with extensive expertise in managing complex vascular conditions. He holds an MBBS, along with DNB qualifications in both General Surgery and Vascular Surgery, earned from prestigious institutions like St. Martha’s Hospital and Narayana Health in Bengaluru. Dr. Sutradhar’s specialties include varicose vein surgeries (open surgery, LASER/Radiofrequency ablation, foam sclerotherapy), deep vein procedures (DVT thrombolysis, venous stenting, IVC filters), and advanced aortic surgeries such as endovascular aortic stent grafts and aortic aneurysm repairs.

 

Known for his compassionate patient care and precise diagnostic skills, Dr. Sutradhar has successfully treated numerous complex cases, contributing significantly to his field. His active involvement in research and participation in various vascular surgery workshops has further solidified his expertise. As a member of the Vascular Society of India (VSI), he continues to stay at the forefront of medical advancements in thoracic and vascular surgery.

Brief Profile

Dr. Jayant Gul Mulchandani is a distinguished Surgical Gastroenterologist renowned for his expertise in a range of complex gastrointestinal and bariatric procedures. With a comprehensive educational background including MBBS, MS in General Surgery, and multiple fellowships in Gastrointestinal Surgery, Colon and Rectal Surgery, and Robotic Gastrointestinal Surgery, Dr. Mulchandani stands out for his advanced skills and innovative approaches. He is notably the first Surgical Gastroenterologist in India to receive a Fellowship in Robotic General and GI Surgery from the Vattikuti Foundation at Narayana Health City, Bengaluru.

 

Dr. Mulchandani specializes in a variety of intricate procedures including esophagectomy, gastrectomy, colectomy, hepatectomy, pancreatectomy, and advanced laparoscopic and robotic surgeries. His expertise also encompasses bariatric surgery, tumour resection, and endoscopic mucosal resection (EMR). Known for his meticulous attention to detail and empathetic patient care, he adeptly handles complex cases with a focus on delivering precise diagnoses and effective treatments. His commitment to minimally invasive techniques and cutting-edge surgical methods underscores his dedication to advancing patient care in gastrointestinal surgery.
