Brief Profile

Dr. Nandish H K is a highly skilled Consultant Gastroenterologist at NH Hospitals, Bengaluru, renowned for his expertise in diagnosing and managing a broad spectrum of gastrointestinal and liver diseases. He completed his MD in Internal Medicine from Kempegowda Institute of Medical Sciences, Bengaluru, and his DNB in Gastroenterology from the prestigious Amrita Institute of Medical Sciences. Further enhancing his qualifications, Dr. Nandish pursued a post-doctoral fellowship in Advanced Therapeutic Endoscopy and Endoscopic Ultrasound at Amrita Institute of Medical Sciences, Kochi.

 

Dr. Nandish's practice is distinguished by his proficiency in advanced endoscopic procedures, including ERCP, EUS, and cholangioscopy, as well as his specialization in image-enhanced endoscopy. His areas of interest encompass pancreaticobiliary interventions and the management of complex inflammatory bowel diseases (IBD) such as ulcerative colitis, Crohn’s disease, and microscopic colitis. With a keen focus on translational research, Dr. Nandish has contributed numerous papers and has been recognized for his award-winning presentations at national conferences. His comprehensive approach includes medication management, nutritional counselling, lifestyle modifications, and preventive care, ensuring a holistic and evidence-based treatment for his patients.

Areas of Interest
Inflammatory Bowel Diseases (IBD) including Ulcerative colitis
Crohn’s Disease, Microscopic colitis, and Enteritis
Nutritional assessment and diet in IBD
Upper GI endoscopy, sigmoidoscopy, and colonoscopy
Expertise in Translational Research; Upper GI endoscopy (OGD)
Flexible sigmoidoscopy; Colonoscopy
Immunotherapies for IBD (biological drugs)
Evaluation and diagnosis of Colorectal cancer
Diseases of Liver and gallbladder
Diagnostic and interventional endoscopy
Immunotherapy in IBD
Specialist care in IBD
Endoscopy and Translational Research
Chromoendoscopy and Virtual chromoendoscopy

Brief Profile

Dr. Veena Ramachandran is a distinguished specialist in Immunology and Rheumatology with extensive expertise in treating a wide range of autoimmune and inflammatory conditions. She holds an MBBS, an MD in General Medicine, and a Fellowship in Rheumatology. Dr. Ramachandran’s clinical practice is marked by her deep commitment to personalized patient care and advanced treatment techniques.

 

Her areas of specialization include managing complex conditions such as rheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, psoriatic arthritis, gout, systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), systemic sclerosis, and Sjogren's syndrome. Dr. Ramachandran also addresses reproductive immunology issues like anti-phospholipid syndrome, implantation failure, and recurrent pregnancy loss. She is skilled in using biologics, disease-modifying anti-rheumatic drugs (DMARDs), corticosteroids, and various pain management therapies. Her approach integrates the use of joint injections, plasma exchange (plasmapheresis), and lifestyle modifications to tailor treatments to individual patient needs, ensuring effective and compassionate care.

Brief Profile

Dr. Matam Sri Anusha is a skilled Rheumatologist with 6 years of experience in Immunology and Rheumatology. She completed her MBBS and MD in General Medicine from Dr. NTR University of Health Sciences, Andhra Pradesh, followed by a DM in Clinical Immunology and Rheumatology from the Tamil Nadu Dr. M.G.R. Medical University. Dr. Anusha is a dedicated member of the Indian Rheumatology Association.

 

Specializing in the management of autoimmune diseases and inflammatory conditions, Dr. Anusha offers comprehensive care for a range of disorders, including rheumatoid arthritis, scleroderma, and gout. Her expertise includes the use of advanced treatments such as disease-modifying anti-rheumatic drugs (DMARDs), biologic agents, and immunotherapy. She also provides pain management therapies, lifestyle modifications, and physical therapy to enhance patient outcomes. Dr. Anusha's approach is centred on personalized care, aiming to improve quality of life and manage chronic conditions effectively.

Brief Profile

Dr. Basavaraj G S is a highly skilled Endocrinologist and Diabetologist with over 13 years of experience in managing a wide range of hormonal and metabolic disorders. He holds an MBBS from Mahadevappa Rampura Medical College, followed by an MD in General Medicine from PGIMER, Chandigarh, and a DNB in Endocrinology from Tamil Nadu Dr. M.G.R. Medical University. Dr. Basavaraj specializes in the management of diabetes, thyroid disorders, adrenal and pituitary conditions, osteoporosis, and lipid disorders. His expertise includes insulin therapy, oral hypoglycaemic agents, hormone replacement therapy, and lifestyle modifications.

 

Known for his patient-centric approach, Dr. Basavaraj emphasizes holistic care, blending medical treatment with lifestyle changes to empower his patients to achieve better health outcomes. He is actively involved in organizing diabetes education programs and regularly participates in national and international conferences to stay at the forefront of advancements in endocrinology. Dr. Basavaraj's dedication to improving the quality of care through education and motivation has made him a trusted name in the field of endocrinology.

Brief Profile

Dr. Jyoti S Narayankar is an experienced Obstetrician and Gynaecologist, dedicated to providing comprehensive care for women’s health. With an MBBS and a Diploma in Obstetrics and Gynaecology (DGO), Dr. Jyoti specializes in managing a wide range of conditions related to reproductive health, pregnancy, and gynaecological concerns. She is known for her patient-centred approach, offering personalized care to each of her patients, ensuring their comfort and well-being at every stage.

 

In addition to her expertise in obstetrics and gynaecology, Dr. Jyoti is skilled in managing chronic metabolic diseases such as diabetes, hypertension, and thyroid disorders, as well as pulmonary and infectious diseases. Her holistic approach to medicine ensures that her patients receive thorough and compassionate care, focusing not just on treatment but also on prevention and long-term health. Dr. Jyoti is fluent in English and is committed to helping her patients make informed and positive health decisions.

Brief Profile

Dr. Ravikiran Mahalank is a highly experienced Dermatologist, Venereologist, and Cosmetologist based in Bellandur, Bangalore. With 16 years of expertise, he has established himself as a leading specialist in dermatology and cosmetic procedures

 

Dr. Mahalank's expertise encompasses a wide range of dermatological and cosmetic treatments. He is skilled in performing nail and hair surgeries, mole removal, acne scar surgery, and excision of sebaceous cysts and lipomas. Additionally, he offers advanced cosmetic procedures such as facial rejuvenation, anti-aging treatments, Botox, fillers, and non-surgical face tightening. His proficiency extends to laser treatments for scar resurfacing, hair reduction, and tattoo removal. Dr. Mahalank’s commitment to patient care and his comprehensive approach to both invasive and non-invasive treatments make him a distinguished practitioner in his field.

Brief Profile

Dr. Suhel Hasan is a highly experienced ENT specialist with over 35 years of expertise in treating a wide range of ear, nose, and throat conditions. Fluent in English, Hindi, Kannada, and Tamil, he connects effortlessly with patients from diverse backgrounds, ensuring comfort and clarity in his care.

 

Dr. Hasan holds esteemed qualifications, including an MS in ENT, DLO RCS (Eng.), and FICS. His surgical expertise spans ear surgeries like tympanoplasty, nasal polypectomy, sinus surgeries, and tonsillectomy, among others. Known for his compassionate approach, he delivers personalised care, emphasizing patient well-being throughout their treatment journey.

 

In addition to his clinical practice, Dr. Hasan has made notable contributions to global healthcare as a consultant to ICF (WHO) Geneva and a training consultant for the Pan-African Network. His dedication to advancing the field of ENT is further reflected in his over 30 published research papers in national and international journals.

Areas of Interest
Ear Surgery
Sinus Surgery
Laryngeal surgery surgical procedures in ENT

Brief Profile

Dr. Shivaprasad K S is a seasoned Endocrinologist and Diabetologist with 16 years of experience. Based in Electronic City, Bengaluru, he brings a wealth of expertise to his practice. He completed his MBBS from Mysore Medical College in 2004, followed by an MD in Medicine from Vijayanagara Institute of Medical Sciences in 2008, and a DM in Endocrinology from IPGMER, Kolkata, in 2014.

 

Dr. Shivaprasad specializes in managing complex endocrinological and diabetic conditions, including thyroid disorders, gestational diabetes, and paediatric diabetes. He also offers advanced bioidentical hormone therapies for both men and women. His extensive experience and dedication to patient care make him a trusted professional in his field. Dr. Shivaprasad is a member of the Karnataka Medical Council and is committed to providing comprehensive and effective treatments tailored to each patient's needs.

Brief Profile
Dr. Ramakrishnakumar S is a seasoned Cardiologist specializing in Cardiac Electrophysiology with 12 years of experience. He holds an MBBS, MD in General Medicine, and DM in Cardiology, complemented by a Fellowship in Electrophysiology. His expertise encompasses a range of advanced cardiovascular procedures, including endovascular treatments for aortic diseases, carotid interventions, percutaneous aortic valve implantation, and myocardial septal ablation.
 
Known for his meticulous attention to detail and compassionate patient care, Dr. Ramakrishnakumar has effectively managed numerous complex cardiac cases. His proficiency in procedures such as angioplasty (PTCA), coronary angiogram, and CT coronary angiography underscores his comprehensive approach to diagnosing and treating heart conditions. Dr. Ramakrishnakumar’s commitment to excellence in both clinical practice and patient empathy makes him a respected figure in his field.

Brief Profile

Dr. Saurabh Bhargava is a highly experienced Urologist with over 19 years of expertise in the field. He holds an MBBS from Bangalore Medical College and Research Institute, along with prestigious qualifications such as FRCS in Urology from the Royal College of Surgeons and MRCS (UK). His vast clinical knowledge and surgical skills have made him a trusted name in urological care.

 

Dr. Bhargava’s practice is centred around advanced urological procedures, with a strong focus on minimally invasive and endoscopic surgeries. Known for his precise diagnosis and patient-centric approach, he has handled a wide range of complex cases throughout his career. He is also a member of the Karnataka Medical Council, further highlighting his dedication to professional excellence in urology.

Brief Profile

Dr. Sharath is a highly skilled General Surgeon with specialized expertise in Surgical Gastroenterology. Holding an MBBS, MS in General Surgery, and a Fellowship in Surgical Gastroenterology, he is proficient in performing complex procedures such as liver resections, Whipple’s surgery, laparoscopic cholecystectomy, and advanced gastrointestinal surgeries. His surgical repertoire includes minor and major liver resections, pancreaticojejunostomy, bile duct surgeries, gastrectomies, and advanced laparoscopic techniques for conditions like hernias and bariatric surgery.

 

Dr. Sharath is also adept at managing a wide range of gastrointestinal and liver disorders, including inflammatory bowel disease (IBD), pancreatic diseases, and functional gastrointestinal disorders. He brings a deep understanding of gastrointestinal oncology and offers endoscopic procedures and advanced therapeutic endoscopy for effective diagnosis and treatment. With a strong focus on precision and patient care, Dr. Sharath’s approach is patient-centred, ensuring the best outcomes for those dealing with complex digestive health issues.

Brief Profile

Dr. Swaratika Mazumdar is a highly skilled Medical Oncologist with a strong academic background, holding an MBBS, MD in General Medicine, and a DM in Oncology. She specializes in the diagnosis, staging, and treatment of a wide range of cancers, including breast, lung, colorectal, prostate, and gynaecologic cancers. Her expertise extends to hematologic malignancies such as leukaemia, lymphoma, and myeloma, as well as gastrointestinal and genitourinary cancers. Dr. Swaratika is dedicated to providing comprehensive, multidisciplinary cancer care, ensuring that each patient receives a personalized treatment plan tailored to their unique needs.

 

With a focus on both common and rare cancers, Dr. Mazumdar stays at the forefront of advancements in cancer genetics and genomics, offering cutting-edge therapies and treatments. She emphasizes a holistic approach to cancer care, coordinating with various specialties to deliver seamless and integrated care throughout the patient’s journey. Her commitment to excellence in oncology is reflected in her compassionate care and dedication to improving patient outcomes.

Sarcomas and rare cancers

Brief Profile

Dr. C. Shivani is a dedicated ENT Specialist with over 10 years of experience in the field. She holds an MBBS and an MS in Otorhinolaryngology and is fluent in English, Telugu, Hindi, and Kannada. Dr. Shivani's expertise spans a wide range of ENT procedures, including Adeno-Tonsillectomy with Grommet Insertion, Tympanoplasty, Cortical Mastoidectomy, and Septoplasty (both conventional and endoscopic). She is also skilled in advanced surgeries like FESS (Functional Endoscopic Sinus Surgery), Endoscopic Dacryocystorhinostomy, and various head and neck procedures.

 

In addition to her clinical work, Dr. Shivani is a lifetime member of the Indian Medical Association and the AOI Bangalore, reflecting her commitment to staying updated with the latest advancements in her field. Her approach is centered around providing personalized, compassionate care to each of her patients, ensuring they receive the best possible treatment outcomes.

Brief Profile

Dr. Priya Subbaraj is a highly skilled Family Medicine specialist with extensive experience in managing a wide range of health conditions. Holding an MBBS degree and a DNB in Family Medicine, she is proficient in both English and Kannada, enabling her to communicate effectively with patients from diverse backgrounds. Her areas of expertise include the management of chronic conditions such as hypertension, diabetes, thyroid disorders, and hyperlipidaemia, along with treating asthma and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). Dr. Priya is also experienced in addressing cardiovascular concerns like coronary artery disease and heart failure.

 

In addition to her expertise in chronic metabolic diseases, Dr. Priya is adept in treating gastrointestinal disorders, kidney diseases, and infectious diseases such as urinary tract infections and sepsis. With a focus on holistic patient care, she provides comprehensive treatment plans that cater to the physical, emotional, and lifestyle aspects of her patients' health. Whether it’s managing long-term conditions or providing preventive care, Dr. Priya’s approach emphasizes patient well-being and long-term health.

Brief Profile

Dr. Sadat M S is an accomplished General Surgeon with specialized training, holding an MBBS, MS in General Surgery, and a Fellowship in Colorectal Surgery. He is dedicated to providing comprehensive surgical care and is fluent in English, ensuring clear communication with his patients.

 

His expertise encompasses a wide range of surgical procedures, including liver resections, pancreatic surgeries such as Whipple's procedure, and advanced laparoscopic techniques. Dr. Sadat is skilled in performing complex operations like colectomies and gastrectomies, as well as handling biliary tract and inflammatory bowel diseases. His ability to perform intricate redo surgeries further highlights his commitment to addressing challenging cases.

 

Dr. Sadat's approach is patient-centred, focusing on individualized treatment plans and thorough evaluations to achieve the best possible outcomes. His extensive knowledge of gastrointestinal disorders and dedication to advanced therapeutic techniques make him a trusted choice for patients seeking specialized surgical care.

Brief Profile

Nimyadas T is a skilled physiotherapist with a Master’s in Physiotherapy, dedicated to helping patients achieve their rehabilitation goals. She is fluent in English, which allows her to communicate effectively with a diverse range of clients. With a comprehensive approach, Nimyadas specializes in various therapeutic techniques, including exercise therapy, manual therapy, and aquatic therapy, tailored to meet the unique needs of each patient.

 

Her expertise spans multiple areas of physiotherapy, including orthopaedic, neurological, cardiopulmonary, and paediatric care. Nimyadas is particularly passionate about sports physiotherapy and women’s health, providing specialized services in pelvic health and pain management. Through personalized treatment plans, she empowers her patients to improve their function, mobility, and overall quality of life.

 

Committed to continuous learning, Nimyadas emphasizes postural education and functional training in her practice, ensuring that patients not only recover but also gain the skills needed to prevent future injuries. Her compassionate approach and dedication to holistic care make her a valuable resource for individuals seeking to enhance their physical well-being.

Brief Profile

Dr. J. Chandrasekar is a distinguished Surgical Gastroenterologist with extensive expertise in complex gastrointestinal surgeries. He specializes in a range of procedures, including esophagectomy, gastrectomy, colectomy, hepatectomy, pancreatectomy, and minimally invasive laparoscopic surgeries. His expertise also extends to bariatric surgeries, inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) resection, tumor resections, and endoscopic mucosal resection (EMR).

 

With a solid academic foundation, Dr. Chandrasekar completed his MBBS from Madurai Medical College and earned his MS in General Surgery from Stanley Medical College, followed by an MCh in Surgical Gastroenterology from Madras Medical College. He also achieved his FRCS from Edinburgh, UK. His professional journey includes key roles in the UK at hospitals like Norwich & Norfolk University Hospital and Royal Cornwall Hospital, and he has held consultant positions at Bhagwan Mahaveer Jain Hospital, Bangalore. Dr. Chandrasekar’s focus on esophageal, gastric, colorectal, hepatobiliary, and pancreatic surgeries, coupled with his passion for minimally invasive techniques, showcases his commitment to providing advanced and compassionate care to his patients.

Areas of Interest
Esophageal Surgery
Gastric Surgery
Colorectal Surgery
Hepatobiliary Surgery

Brief Profile

Dr. Robbie Kurian George is a highly skilled Vascular and Endovascular Surgeon. He holds an MBBS, MS in General Surgery, and a DNB in General Surgery, along with a Fellowship in General and Vascular Surgery. Fluent in English, Hindi, and Kannada, Dr. George is available for consultations at Narayana Clinic, HSR Layout, every Saturday from 10:30 AM to 12:00 PM.

 

Specializing in Vascular and Endovascular Surgery, Dr. George offers treatments such as Coronary Angiogram, Coronary Angioplasty (PTCA), CABG, Pacemaker Implantation, Valve Replacement, Open Heart Surgery, Aortic Valve Replacement, Thrombectomy, and Pulmonary Valve Replacement (PVR). He has extensive expertise in managing Aortic Aneurysms, Aortic Stent Graft Placement, Peripheral Aneurysms, Peripheral Arterial Disease, Carotid Disease, and Venous Diseases. Dr. George is an esteemed member of the Vascular Society of India, National Academy of Medical Sciences, Association of Surgeons of India, and the British Medical Association.

Dr. Vinu Raj is a distinguished Orthopaedician. He holds qualifications of MBBS, MRCS, and FRCS, he specializes in Orthopaedics & Joint Replacement. Dr. Raj offers a wide range of treatments, including Microscopic Decompression, Spinal Stabilisation, Cervical Cord Decompression, Anterior Cervical Discectomy and Fusion, Posterior Cervical Decompression and Stabilisation, Lumbar Interbody Fusions, and Spinal Infection Treatment. His expertise encompasses Spinal Navigation and Robotic Spine Surgery, Minimally Invasive Spine Surgery, and various spinal injections and blocks.

Brief Profile

Dr. Sharat Damodar is a highly experienced Haematologist. He specializes in adult haemato-oncology and bone marrow transplantation. He holds an MBBS, DMB, MD, and DM, and is proficient in English, Hindi, Telugu, Kannada, and Tamil.

Dr. Sandhya Suvarna, is highly skilled dermatologist in providing advanced dermatological treatments. Holding an MBBS and DDVL, Dr. Suvarna specializes in facial aesthetics and is proficient in a wide range of anti-aging and nonsurgical treatments.

 

At Narayana Clinic, HSR, she offers comprehensive solutions including Botox, fillers, threads, acne and acne scar treatment, hair fall treatment, micro-needling, laser scar resurfacing, carbon peel, and both invasive and non-invasive anti-aging treatments. Fluent in English, Hindi, and Kannada, Dr. Suvarna is available for consultations from Monday to Saturday, 1:00 PM to 5:00 PM.

 

Her dedication to patient care and expertise in the latest dermatological advancements make her a trusted choice for those seeking exceptional skin and hair treatments.

Brief Profile

Dr. Aarti Kamath is a highly skilled and experienced medical doctor specializing in Internal Medicine. With a robust background in hospital settings, she excels in diagnosing and devising effective patient treatment plans. Known for her empathetic and professional demeanor, Dr. Kamath is proficient in patient counselling, preventive care, and promoting positive lifestyle changes. Brief Profile

Dr. Uday Nagesh Shivaji is a seasoned Gastroenterologist and General Physician. He currently practices at the Mazumdar Shaw Medical Center. Dr. Uday specializes in diagnosing and treating a wide range of gastrointestinal disorders, as well as providing general medical care.

 

He completed his MBBS from MS Ramaiah Medical College and Teaching Hospital, Bangalore, in 2004. Dr. Uday has earned a reputation for his clinical expertise, compassionate patient care, and dedication to improving patient health. His commitment to staying updated with the latest advancements in medicine enable him to deliver effective treatments and personalized care.

 

In addition to his clinical practice, Dr. Uday is known for his patient-centered approach, emphasizing thorough evaluations and tailored treatment plans. His broad skill set in both gastroenterology and general medicine makes him a trusted healthcare provider.

Dr. Kiran specializes in a wide range of endoscopic procedures, including UGI Endoscopy, Colonoscopy, PEG Placement, Endoscopic Dilatations, and Polypectomy, among others. Patients in Hosur seeking expert gastroenterological care can trust Dr. Kiran's extensive experience and compassionate approach to treatment.

Brief Profile
Dr. Akshatha Nayak U is a dedicated Hemato Oncologist with extensive training and experience in Adult Hematology-Oncology and Bone Marrow Transplantation (BMT). She holds an MBBS and MD, followed by a Fellowship in Hemato-oncology from Mazumdar Shaw Medical Centre and a DM in Clinical Hematology from the Institute of Hematology and Transfusion Medicine. Her expertise lies in the management of adult hematological conditions, including targeted therapy in acute leukemias, bone marrow transplantation, as well as benign and malignant hematology.
 
Practicing at Narayana Clinic, Jayanagar, Dr. Akshatha Nayak U is available for consultations every Wednesday from 4:30 PM to 6:30 PM. She is fluent in English, Hindi, and Kannada, allowing her to connect effectively with a diverse patient population. Dr. Nayak is committed to providing compassionate care, ensuring that her patients receive the best possible treatment tailored to their individual needs.

Adult Hematology

Benign Hematology and Malignant Hematology

Brief Profile

Dr. Sowmya G S is an experienced Paediatrician, holding an MBBS and DNB in Paediatrics. She is skilled in neonatal resuscitation, the transport of critically ill infants, and the management of pre-term babies. Dr. Sowmya has extensive expertise in performing critical procedures such as endotracheal intubation, exchange transfusion, and lumbar puncture. She is deeply committed to providing high-quality paediatric care, with a special focus on child nutrition, rehabilitation, and paediatric critical care.

 

Having trained under the renowned paediatrician Dr. D.G. Benakappa, Dr. Sowmya brings a wealth of knowledge to the management of infectious diseases and behavioural disorders in children. Her holistic approach extends to offering parent counselling, ensuring families receive comprehensive guidance in their child's healthcare. Known for her compassionate care and clinical expertise, Dr. Sowmya is dedicated to improving the health and well-being of children.

Areas of Interest
Infectious diseases in children
Behavioural disorders in children

Brief Profile

Dr. Gayathri Meganathan is a passionate Obstetrician and Gynaecologist with over 14 years of experience in women's healthcare. She holds an MBBS from IRT Government Medical College, Perundurai, and an MRCOG (UK), reflecting her dedication to advancing her expertise in obstetrics and gynaecology. Dr. Gayathri is also a skilled Laparoscopic Surgeon, Fertility Specialist, and Clinical Embryologist, specializing in high-risk pregnancies, infertility treatments, PCOD management, and minimal access surgeries (MAS). Her commitment to ethical practices and patient-centred care ensures optimal wellness for every woman she treats.

 

With additional fellowships in FMAS, DMAS, and ART (Assisted Reproductive Technology), Dr. Gayathri has worked alongside international doctors to provide quality care. Her areas of expertise include adolescent gynaecology, pre-conception counselling, contraceptive advice, and menopause management. She is an active member of the Indian Society for Assisted Reproduction (ISAR), World Association of Laparoscopic Surgeons (WALS), and Manipal Association of Clinical Embryologists (MACE), continually contributing to the field through her involvement in research and advanced medical techniques.

Prenatal Care
Labor and Delivery Management
Postpartum Care
Routine Gynecological Exams
Menstrual Disorders Treatment
Contraception and Family Planning
Menopause Management
Reproductive Endocrinology
Gynecologic Surgery
Infertility Treatment

Brief Profile

Dr. Sathish Kumar S is a distinguished Senior Consultant in Orthopedics and Joint Replacement, with a specialization in Endocrinology and Diabetes Mellitus. With over 25 years of experience, Dr. Kumar has established a reputation for his expertise in managing complex cases of diabetes, thyroid disorders, and other hormonal imbalances. He completed his MBBS at Bangalore Medical College before advancing his training in the UK, where he earned his MRCP (GIM and Endocrinology) and CCST in Endocrinology and Diabetes.

 

In addition to his extensive background in endocrinology, Dr. Kumar is well-versed in a range of orthopaedic procedures, including total hip and knee replacements, arthroscopy, and spinal surgeries. His comprehensive approach also covers the management of obesity, hypertension, dyslipidaemia, and polycystic ovarian disease. Dr. Kumar’s dual expertise in both endocrinology and orthopaedic surgery allows him to offer a holistic approach to patient care, addressing both metabolic and musculoskeletal health issues.

+ 5

Stay Connected With
One Health

Brief Profile

Dr. Prashant Tejwani earned his MBBS degree from Indore Medical College and completed his M.S. in Orthopedics from SMS Medical College, Jaipur, in April 2000. He gained a year of hands-on experience at Udai Clinic, Hyderabad, under the mentorship of Dr. Ved Prakash and Dr. Raghav Dutt, focusing on trauma and sports medicine. Subsequently, he joined Nizam's Institute of Medical Sciences as a registrar, where he served for three years. His passion for academics and teaching led him to continue at the institute, eventually being appointed as an assistant professor in the Department of Orthopedics.

 

Dr. Tejwani further honed his expertise in sports medicine and arthroscopic surgeries by attending foundational and advanced courses at prestigious institutes in India and abroad. To expand his skill set, he trained for six weeks in Liverpool, UK, visiting various institutes to learn advanced techniques that he could implement to benefit his patients in India. He also received specialized training in arthroscopic surgeries from renowned experts such as Dr. Anant Joshi (Mumbai), Dr. Bharat Modi (Baroda), and Dr. David Rajan (Coimbatore).

 

Over the years, Dr. Tejwani has participated in numerous Continuing Medical Education (CME) programs and symposiums on arthroscopy organized by the Indian Arthroscopy Society and the India-European Arthroscopy Foundation. He has presented his work at various regional, national, and international conferences. Additionally, he has conducted CMEs on upper limb trauma at SPARSH Hospital. Committed to community health, he has organized bone health camps and led osteoporosis awareness initiatives at institutions such as 3M, Novozyme, and Sensura.

Areas of Interest
Sports Injuries for Professional sports person
Arthroscopic Surgeries (Ligament Reconstruction, ACL, PCL, Multiligament Knee Surgery, Meniscal Surgeries of Knee, Cartilage Injury Management)

Osteoporosis Management
Ergonomics & Management of Carpal Tunnel
Plantar Fasciitis and Tennis Elbow

Brief Profile

Dr. Prasenjit Sutradhar is a skilled Thoracic and Vascular Surgeon with expertise in a range of advanced surgical procedures. His proficiency spans esophagectomy, gastrectomy, colectomy, hepatectomy, pancreatectomy, and various laparoscopic procedures, including bariatric surgeries like gastric bypass and sleeve gastrectomy. Additionally, Dr. Sutradhar specializes in complex cases of resection for inflammatory bowel disease (IBD), tumour resections, and endoscopic mucosal resection (EMR).

 

Dr. Sutradhar completed his medical training at Government Medical College, Mysore, followed by a DNB in General Surgery from St. Martha’s Hospital, Bengaluru. After practicing as a General and Laparoscopic Surgeon for two years, he further honed his skills in Vascular and Endovascular Surgery at Narayana Health. With a strong focus on oesophageal, gastric, and hepatobiliary surgeries, as well as minimally invasive and gastrointestinal oncology surgeries, Dr. Sutradhar brings a patient-centred approach to treating complex conditions with precision and care.

Brief Profile

Dr. Manjula B is a renowned Psychiatric Social Worker with over 14 years of experience. She brings a wealth of knowledge and compassion to Narayana Clinic, Electronic City. Her impressive credentials include an MSW, M Phil, and PhD in Psychiatric Social Work, showcasing her unwavering commitment to excellence in the field. 


Fluent in five languages – English, Kannada, Hindi, Telugu, and Tamil – Dr. Manjula ensures clear communication and builds trust with a diverse range of patients seeking mental health support.  


Dr. Manjula is a recognized leader, holding distinctions such as a Gold Medallist in MSW and Best Paper Award winner at a National Conference. She actively contributes to the advancement of the field through research, publications in national and international journals, and participation in conferences. 


Dr. Manjula's philosophy is rooted in the belief that mental health is just as important as physical health. She offers a safe space for individuals and families to address their mental health concerns. Dr. Manjula is a skilled therapist, providing individual therapy for stress management, anxiety, depression, and addiction. Her expertise also extends to marital/family therapy, sex therapy, and child and adolescent mental health. She is a dedicated advocate for community mental health and actively trains others in child protection services, stress management, and counselling skills.

Brief Profile

Dr. Arti Priya R is a distinguished Dermatologist and Aesthetic Specialist with nine years of experience in dermatology and cosmetology. She completed her MBBS from The Tamil Nadu Dr. M.G.R. Medical University in 2015 and pursued a DDVL from Madras Medical College, Chennai in 2017. Further enhancing her expertise, Dr. Arti earned a Fellowship in Aesthetic Dermatology from CUTIS Academy of Cutaneous Sciences in the same year.

 

Specializing in a range of dermatological and cosmetic procedures, Dr. Arti excels in nail and hair surgeries, mole removal, and acne scar surgery. She offers comprehensive treatments including facial rejuvenation, anti-aging solutions, and hair fall treatment. Her services also encompass advanced procedures such as Botox, fillers, PRP, thread lifts, laser scar resurfacing, and skin tightening. Dr. Arti is a member of the Indian Association of Dermatologists, Venereologists, and Leprologists (IADVL) and the National Guidelines Committee (NGC), reflecting her commitment to professional excellence and ongoing development in her field.

The clinic itself was well-equipped with modern facilities and technology, which gave me confidence in the quality of care I was receiving. Overall, my experience at Narayana Health Clinic Manipal County Road was excellent, and I would highly recommend it to anyone in need of medical attention. The staff's professionalism, the doctor's expertise, and the clinic's top-notch facilities all contributed to making my visit a positive one." Also home collection service is excellent. I would like to thank you Kalyani for excellent service.

Ramesh Nandyala
Bengaluru

I cannot speak highly enough of the outstanding service and compassionate care I received at Narayana Clinic. From the moment I stepped through the doors, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism by the staff. Each member of the team went above and beyond to ensure that I felt comfortable and well-cared for during my visit. The nurses and administrative staff were incredibly efficient and attentive, making sure that all of my needs were met promptly. Additionally, the doctors at Narayana Clinic demonstrated a deep level of expertise and genuine concern for my well-being. They took the time to listen to my concerns and provided me with thorough explanations and personalized treatment plans. I was truly impressed by the level of teamwork and dedication exhibited by everyone at Narayana Clinic. Their commitment to excellence is evident in every aspect of their service, and I would highly recommend this clinic to anyone in need of medical care. Thank you to the entire staff for your exceptional service and unwavering support.

Frequently Asked Questions
How do I schedule an appointment?

You can schedule appointments through various convenient channels: 

The NH Care app 
Call our call centre number 7026222222 
Visit our website
  
Do you accept insurance, and which providers do you work with?

We accept insurance for selected services such as chemotherapy and dialysis. For more details, please contact us directly.

Can I request a specific doctor?

Yes, you can request a specific doctor who is available at our clinic. 

What are your clinic's operating hours?

Our operating hours are as follows: 

E-City Clinic: 7 AM to 9 PM 
HSR Clinic: 7 AM to 9 PM 
Other Clinics: 8 AM to 8 PM 
How do I obtain my medical records?

You can obtain your medical records through the NH Care app.

Neurology
NEUROLOGY
Overview

Neurology deals with the diagnosis and management of conditions affecting the brain, spinal cord, and nerves. Neurological disorders, if left untreated, can affect movement, cognition, and overall well-being. Our neurologists are equipped with the expertise to address both common and complex neurological issues.

Book Appointment
Common Conditions Treated
Stroke
Epilepsy
Migraine and headaches
Neuropathy
Parkinson’s disease
Multiple sclerosis
Why Choose Narayana One Health Clinic?

Our neurologists use advanced techniques and a patient-first approach to ensure precise diagnosis and effective treatment. Regain control of your health, book your appointment now!
